0 0 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-05-26 2leo2 Sweet, Light, Quiet, and Smooth The LG vacuum is great, lightweight and cleans not only hard floor and carpet, but also itself. The battery lasts about 1.5 hours, which should be enough to clean the It comes with a second battery that can be charged while the primary battery is being used. The charging dock however has a place to store and charge both batteries at the same time if needed. All accessories have storage space in the base, so you don't have to find a place for them. Has awesome wifi features to detect cleaning efficiency.\n\nThe mop attachment is not better than a steam mop but it does the job. The motor is quiet and mobility is smooth and effortless when pushing along the floor. I love the self cleaning feature, saves me time from cleaning out the vacuum myself. It does get loud during this process but it only lasts around 20 seconds. I had to clean out the canister that the waste goes in every 4 full uses, which isn't that often. Assembly is easy, just came in 5 pieces.\n\nOverall, the vacuum is a well needed product and conveniently packaged in a way to prevent major maintenance. 5 0.312558 0.257945 sweet, light, quiet, 2 2 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2023-04-01 AA23250706 It really sucks We’ve had this vacuum a few weeks and are completely satisfied. It has strong suction and the back up battery helps us get our full house completed. Knowing that we have a limited time helps us clean faster too. I was worried that there would be an issue with it picking up cereal because of previous reviews, but it looks like that has been updated. We are always vacuuming up Cheerios with no problem. The sleek design and cool feature have interested our oldest in helping out around the house vacuuming every chance they get. I also love the self emptying feature. I took a star off because it can only be stored on a hard surface which is limiting. Otherwise this was a great investment. 6 6 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2022-09-17 AceofSpades1996 10/10 Would Recommend! I have owned this vacuum for about 6 months now, and I am impressed with the suction it provides and the battery life. The difference attachments make this vacuum one of the most versatile, if not THE most versatile (and lightweight!) vacuums money can buy currently! The LG mobile app this device pairs with could use some refining. The self emptying feature is me and my 2 year old sons favorite feature by far. The only thing I wish was different about this product is that it came with more dust bins for the self emptying feature within the housing for the vacuum. Overall I am happy with this purchase! 7 7 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-05-29 AcurNet Sleek Powerful Lightweight Vacuum The LG - CordZero Cordless Stick Vacuum with Auto Empty is sleek, light weight, and powerful. Use this vacuum to clean any area in your home. Stairs, furniture, carpet, hardwood/hard surfaces are all easy to clean using the LG - CordZero. \n\nThis vacuum’s versatility is complimented by its maneuverability. Hard to reach places, like under chairs or couches, behind large furniture, and corners can all be free of debris, dust and pet hair thanks to the LG - CordZero Cordless Stick Vacuum. \n\nThe LG - CordZero Cordless Stick Vacuum provides powerful suction with multiple modes that make it easy to adjust the power based on your cleaning requirements. The charging dock is outstanding. It provides an excellent way to store the vacuum neatly and looks great. \n\nThe LG - CordZero Cordless Stick Vacuum is extremely easy to use. The auto empty feature is awesome and makes emptying the collection receptacle a breeze with no mess or spillage. \nThe grip is comfortable. The ergonomic design makes it easy to use the vacuum as long as you need without experiencing fatigue in your hands/arms/wrists. The light weight of the vacuum makes it to clean stairs or even above head locations. \n\nThe battery life is amazing! You can clean multiple rooms on a full charge. On the high powered setting, the vacuum can clean for over 25 minutes without the need for a recharge. \n\nI highly recommend the LG - CordZero Cordless Stick Vacuum. It will ensure your home is clean and free of debris. 5 0.420115 0.136198 sleek, powerful, lightweight, vacuum, lg, cordzero, cordless, stick, vacuum, auto, empty, sleek, light, weight, powerful, use, 27 28 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2022-09-01 Ann59 Makes cleaning enjoyable I was so excited to get the LG Cordzero with ThinQ. With it being cordless, I can vacuum my whole house without searching for nearby outlets and having to plug and replace my vacuum. It has two batteries to ensure that I can finish the job. The charging tower serves as the charging base as well as storing all the extra attachments. You can quickly switch the attachments. It has a crevasse tool to reach between couch cushions, a dusting brush, a pet tool to easily pick up pet hair from my furniture, there's even a mop attachment to do hard surfaces. The ThinQ app will help with maintenance of the vacuum. It has a gratis that will automatically empty the debris that you've vacuumed after each time you use the vacuum. With the kompressor, you can compact debris you've picked up giving additional space to finish vacuuming. The wand is adjustable in length. There are three modes of vacuum power. 5 0.263111 0.247410 make, cleaning, enjoyable, excited, get, lg, cordzero, thinq, cordless, vacuum, whole, house, without, searching, nearby, outlet, plug, replace, vacuum, two, battery, ensure, finish, job, charging, tower, serf, charging, base, well, storing, extra, attachment, quickly, switch, attachment, crevasse, tool, reach, couch, cushion, dusting, brush, pet, tool, easily, pick, pet, hair, furniture, there, even, mop, attachment, hard, surface, thinq, app, help, maintenance, vacuum, gratis, automatically, empty, debris, youve, vacuumed, time, use, vacuum, kompressor, compact, debris, youve, picked, giving, additional, space, finish, vacuuming, wand, adjustable, length, three, mode, vacuum, power makes cleaning enjoyable i was so excited to get the lg cordzero with thinq with it being cordless i can vacuum my whole house without searching for nearby outlets and having to plug and replace my vacuum it has two batteries to ensure that i can finish the job the charging tower serves as the charging base as well as storing all the extra attachments you can quickly switch the attachments it has a crevasse tool to reach between couch cushions a dusting brush a pet tool to easily pick up pet hair from my furniture theres even a mop attachment to do hard surfaces the thinq app will help with maintenance of the vacuum it has a gratis that will automatically empty the debris that youve vacuumed after each time you use the vacuum with the kompressor you can compact debris youve picked up giving additional space to finish vacuuming the wand is adjustable in length there are three modes of vacuum power
28 29 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-11-04 AnnR I wanted to love it and I rarely return but…sigh I really wanted to love this machine. My vacuum died and company was coming. I love LG products so when the salesman suggested it we went for it, without reading the reviews. Got it home, put it together and after vacuuming about 20 sq feet of an oriental rug it started to whir three times and died…plugged. Put it on the stand to clear and that didn’t work. You have to pull out the metal part in the middle of the canister and maneuver your hand to try and clear the too small pipe that feeds the canister. This machine constantly clogs on anything from pet fur to tiny cellophane candy wrappers. If you are lucky you can finish vacuuming an 8 x 10 rug if you manually empty it three times. I’m allergic to dust so a self cleaning vacuum would have been sooo nice but I was constantly manually emptying it. The other features are great. It’s light and easy to maneuver. Suction was good. It’s quiet and was the first vacuum that didn’t scare my dog. The accessories were plentiful. It had style and was ok in my dining room. Darn you LG. I honestly tried. In fact I’m lucky I’m a total tach member and get more than 15 days to return. I bought another that is for pets and it’s doing a great job. In fact the first time I used it I knew immediately that the LG suction was inferior based on what it was picking up on just the Oriental rug. I’m really not sure how this product got into production. Great idea, poorly executed. 1 0.259399 0.398680 wanted, love, rarely, return, sigh, really, wanted, love, machine, vacuum, died, company, coming, love, lg, product, salesman, suggested, went, It does a good job of emptying the dirt out when you stow it. Super easy to use, I would highly recommend this to anyone. The mop attachment actually works good on my hard wood floors. I was worried that it wouldn't perform well since there wasn't any suction and it was just a mop. But it actually picks up a lot of dirt and does a good job scrubbing. 10/10 would recommend. \r\n\r\nI have a 2000 square foot house that is 50/50 carpet and hardwood and I never go through a single battery. So the second battery isn't really needed. The first battery seems to last for almost an hour. And with how dusty Texas is I usually fill up the container in 20-30 minutes and hang up the vacuum. 39 40 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2022-10-27 Aubrey W. Over $900, Broke Two Weeks After Use!! The media could not be loaded.\n \n\n\n\n I purchased the A9 Cord Zero from Amazon, for our new home because we have tiled floors and because of the self clean feature and cordless ability. The vacuum stayed in the original box, unopened for about a month. I finally opened and assembled the unit and found it was a very nice looking vacuum. Two weeks later, the roller started hesitating to spin until it stopped spinning totally and the motor just hums. This vacuum should not cost this much and have such a poor build quality. LG is sending me box to return it for repairs, when they should be replacing it no questions asked. Did not return to Amazon because the 30 days expired while the vacuum was still in the box. 2 0.070859 0.666489 900, broke, two, week, use, medium, could, loaded, purchased, a9, cord, zero, amazon, new, home, tiled, floor, self, clean, feature, cordless, ability, vacuum, stayed, original, box, unopened, month, finally, opened, assembled, unit, found, nice, looking, vacuum, two, week, later, roller, started, hesitating, spin, stopped, spinning, totally, motor, hum, vacuum, cost, much, poor, build, quality, lg, sending, box, return, repair, replacing, question, asked, return, amazon, 30, day, expired, vacuum, still, box over 900 broke two weeks after use the media could not be loaded  i purchased the a9 cord zero from amazon for our new home because we have tiled floors and because of the self clean feature and cordless ability the vacuum stayed in the original box unopened for about a month i finally opened and assembled the unit and found it was a very nice looking vacuum two weeks later the roller started hesitating to spin until it stopped spinning totally and the motor just hums this vacuum should not cost this much and have such a poor build quality lg is sending me box to return it for repairs when they should be replacing it no questions asked did not return to amazon because the 30 days expired while the vacuum was still in the box

43 44 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2021-11-26 Bbjniles Beauty, power and function! Wow, wow, wow…this LG CordZero Vacuum is incredible. It looks so sleek and modern, it holds and hides most of the attachments, it empties itself, and is an absolute workhorse. This is a great piece of equipment…LG has really outdone itself!\r\n\r\nI will say that removing it from the box can be a little intimidating. There are a lot of wrapped pieces, and a ton of instructions. That said, it is intuitively built, so assembling everything is a breeze. The tower opens to reveal cubbies for the three attachments and the brush for occasional cleanings. There too is the bag that holds the refuse when the vacuum is emptied. This is behind a door, so when the tower is opened, everything is put away and tidy.\r\n\r\nIt also comes with a power mop head, though this is very large and will have to be stored separately. Still, we already had a power mop, so we are actually saving room since we can get rid of it, and only have to store the mop head for the CordZero.\r\n\r\nAnd while we are here, I will say that the mop head works very well, spinning vigorously, and sparing your back, as traditional mopping requires much more elbow grease. The pads attach using Velcro, and are easily removed and cleaned. There is a water reservoir and two setting to choose from in terms of wetness. This head is (as too are all the attachments) easily installed and removed.\r\n\r\nThe stick portion of the device requires depressing a sliding button to choose your desired length, so it works well for those of most heights. \r\n\r\nThere is a power bottom on the handle, which is great for those with weak hands or aching joints. Many stick vacuums require you to hold a trigger down, which can be difficult and annoying, but not so with the CordZero. There are three settings, the lowest being fine for most all the time. The battery lasts around an hour, though that varies whether we are using it on our wood floors or carpets. The top setting eats the battery quickly, so we rarely use it. Still, it comes with two batteries, one of which charges in a cubby at the top of the tower while not in use, and you are meant to trade them with each run (as they will, according to the instructions, lose their ability to hold a charge over time). We haven’t experienced reduced battery yet, so I can’t comment on that. The batteries seat nicely in both the vacuum and tower.\r\n\r\nThis thing really is a marvel to look at, especially considering it’s a vacuum. The tower is spare and modern, casting minimalistic lines, and not drawing undue attention, but fitting in well. This is great for us, as we don’t have a closet with an outlet inside, so the CordZero has to stay out in a room. I imagine this is true for many people, so that fact that it looks so clean is a huge plus…it doesn’t clutter up your space, but instead blends into it.\r\n\r\nThe vacuum does feel a bit heavier that precious stick vacuums we’ve owned, but none are as feature robust, and most are corded so you can’t free range your home with them. It is quite loud when you place it in the tower and it empties itself, but it only lasts a few seconds, so it doesn’t cause much distraction. Too, this certainly has more power than I expected, so kudos to LG for that.\r\n\r\nWe really are over the moon with the CordZero…it can do everything, so were able to declutter by removing an old corded stick vacuum, and a corded power mop. And we can do it in high style. \r\n\r\nFrom the aesthetics to the functionality, the LG CordZero is top notch, and I really couldn’t recommend it highly enough! 5 0.237773 0.387460 beauty, power, function, wow, wow, wow, lg, cordzero, vacuum, incredible, look, sleek, modern, hold, hide, attachment, empty, absolute, workhorse, great, piece, equipment, lg, really, outdone, say, removing, box, little, intimidating, lot, wrapped, piece, ton, instruction, said, intuitively, built, assembling, everything, breeze, tower, open, reveal, cubby, three, attachment, brush, occasional, cleaning, bag, hold, refuse, vacuum, emptied, behind, door, tower, opened, everything, put, away, tidy, also, come, power, mop, head, though, large, stored, separately, still, already, power, mop, actually, saving, easily, removed, cleaned, water, reservoir, two, setting, choose, term, wetness, head, attachment, easily, installed, removed, stick, portion, device, requires, depressing, sliding, button, choose, desired, length, work, well, height, power, bottom, handle, great, weak, hand, aching, joint, many, stick, vacuum, require, hold, trigger, difficult, annoying, cordzero, three, setting, lowest, fine, place, tower, empty, last, second, cause, much, distraction, certainly, power, expected, kudos, lg, really, moon, cordzero, everything, able, declutter, removing, old, corded, stick, vacuum, corded, power, mop, high, style, aesthetic, functionality, lg, cordzero, top, notch, really, recommend, highly, enough beauty power and function wow wow wow…this lg cordzero vacuum is incredible it looks so sleek and modern it holds and hides most of the attachments it empties itself and is an absolute workhorse this is a great piece of equipment…lg has really outdone itself\r i will say that removing it not drawing undue attention but fitting in well this is great for us as we don’t have a closet with an outlet inside so the cordzero has to stay out in a room i imagine this is true for many people so that fact that it looks so clean is a huge plus…it doesn’t clutter up your space but instead blends into it\r the vacuum does feel a bit heavier that precious stick vacuums we’ve owned but none are as feature robust and most are corded so you can’t free range your home with them it is quite loud when you place it in the tower and it empties itself but it only lasts a few seconds so it doesn’t cause much distraction too this certainly has more power than i expected so kudos to lg for that\r we really are over the moon with the cordzero…it can do everything so were able to declutter by removing an old corded stick vacuum and a corded power mop and we can do it in high style \r from the aesthetics to the functionality the lg cordzero is top notch and i really couldn’t recommend it highly enough
44 45 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2023-05-24 Becs great features I have read many of the comments from previous reviewers, and agree with all those who said this is a great stick vacuum. I too have a Dyson Animal stick so I was keen to compare. Especially with short dog hair. I can say it works fantastic for that and I am super pleased. I like that I don't have to hold a button down while vacuuming. I also like that the vacuum has a built in extender, so once you take it out of the charging station you can manually elongate the stick because it's already inside (then with the push of a button make it shorter again to store and charge). I like that you don't have to use the auto-empty feature simply by turning that auto feature to OFF in the charging station (because those bags are not eco-friendly and are made with plastic so they need to be thrown in the trash when they are full - BTW in this day and age why not make these bags compostable at least?). Love the replacement battery so you never run out of vacuum time. I wish it had a light so you can see small objects in darker rooms before rolling over them. Mine did not come with the mopping feature so not sure how that feature works, but overall a great stick vacuum system. Pricey, but works great. 5 0.306032 0.340796 great, feature, read, many, comment, previous, reviewer, agree, said, great, stick, vacuum, dyson, animal, stick, keen, compare, especially, short, dog, 45 46 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-05-28 BeingHonest Versatile. Good suction. Extra cleaning steps. Pro:\n-Lightweight and versatile\n-Storage compartments in the tower\n-Auto empty\n-Battery life\n\nCon:\n-Suction could be better\n-A lot of maintenance \n-Small dirt canister\n-Bag costs\n-Will not pick up larger debris\n-Mop attachment is for light cleaning only\n\nThe Vacuum\nThe vacuum is lightweight and versatile. The multi position extending pipe can be detached, turning it into a handheld vac. It comes with the standard head, the crevice and brush attachment, the mop head, and a cleaning brush. The dust canister is small and the Kompressor is really just a ring that you push down to scrape the dust off the filter and compress it down. \n\nThe Tower\nThe tower is the all in one serving as storage, charger, and auto emptying the vacuum. Aesthetically it’s nice and that doesn’t take up a lot of space. The sides open up for accessory storage, but it can only store the crevice, brush, and pet head attachment. The mop head is hung on a hook on the outside. The top opens up for the secondary battery charging. \n\nThe main feature of the tower is the auto empty function which automatically empties out the dust from the vacuum and into a dust bag on the bottom. The bag is about the size of a bag of coffee, and two is included. An additional pack of three costs $20. It does a good job of fully emptying the dust canister, but it can be loud if only for less than 30 seconds. \n\nCleaning\nThe suction could be better. While it can be powerful at max setting, I find that my other stick vacuum of the same price outperforms this one. On carpet, especially if you have pets, I find the suction on normal and medium somewhat disappointing. It’ll pick up surface level and some hair but it won’t pick up fine dust unless I activate Turbo mode. With Tubo on, it did pick up dust deep in the carpet but I have to go over the area a few times. On normal the battery will last about 30 mins, while Turbo will last about 10 mins.\n\nOn hard wood and tiles, normal was good enough, but the head would not pick up larger debris and just ends up pushing it around. \n\nThe mop attachment is only good light cleaning. It only spins at one speed and can only use water. The amount of water can be adjusted between two settings or off. It’s good enough for cleaning the bathroom floor or removing shoe prints of tiles. \n\nMaintenance\nThere’s quite a bit of parts that need regular maintenance. The vacuum has two dust filters that need to be cleaned along with the dust canister filter. The tower also has two filters along with having to change out the dust bags. The mop pads need to be hand washed. \n\nIs it worth it?\nIf you really detest the idea of having to empty the canister with your hands and like having the tower to store everything neatly, then yes. The vacuum is light and versatile, giving you an around cleaner. The suction is powerful at max, but there are others that can outperform it. To me, this vacuum adds more steps for the sake of convenience. Rather than emptying out the canister after use, eventually you’ll end up having to open up the tower to replace the bag and have more filters to clean out. Add to that the cost of additional bags. 4 0.227927 0.369619 versatile, good, suction, extra, cleaning, step, pro, lightweight, versatile, storage, compartment, tower, auto, empty, battery, life, con, suction, could, better, lot, maintenance, small, dirt, canister, bag, cost, pick, larger, debris, mop, attachment, light, cleaning, vacuum, vacuum, lightweight, versatile, multi, position, extending, pipe, detached, turning, handheld, vac, come, standard, head, crevice, brush, attachment, mop, head, cleaning, brush, dust, canister, small, kompressor, really, ring, push, scrape, dust, filter, 51 52 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-06-01 BigA Step up but would have expected more for the price First there is not a lot that I can say bad about the stick vacuum. As a vacuum it does a good job. I have had better but no major complaints. I will say on bare floors with any type of small particles it takes at least a couple of passes to get everything up but it’s not that much worse than other I’ve had (note that this is in the standard mode, you can use the turbo mode and it much better but you suffer in battery.\nPros 1. The extra battery is really nice no one room left and the battery dies. 2. The adjustable stick means that both me and my wife can use it at a comfortable level. 3. The self evacuating chamber no more spill dust around the trash when emptying. 4. The WiFi connection with the lg apps more cool than any great benefit.\nThe marginal 1. The mop feature - while this is a great feature it performance is just ok, it clean most of the stuff however there is no ability to saturate or scrub. Those would have been nice and problem been a game changer\nNow the con - 1. The size of the base is huge it takes some floor or wall space to store. Much larger than anything else I’ve seen. 2. I did have a clog at the bend to the floor attached that required some time to break free. Turn out to be balled up tape with a bunch of stuff attached. 3. And probably most important is the cost at 1K I think there are better option on the market. I honest would go with one of the cheaper LG models and give up the self emptying canister and mop feature and save 500 to 600, however if you could find one on sale in the 700 range it would be worth it. 4 0.183675 0.466004 step, would, expected, price, first, lot, say, bad, stick, vacuum, vacuum, good, job, better, major, complaint, say, bare, floor, type, small, particle, take, least, couple, 60 61 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2023-05-30 C. B. Wells I'm in love with a vacuum Don't get me wrong, I've always been a fan of technology and enjoy new gadgets. But this thing sucks in the best of ways. I had been using the same upright vacuum for nearly two decades, so last year I decided it was time to upgrade to a cordless stick vac as my house is small and I've removed all the carpet. And it is a decent vacuum. But this thing blows it out of the water.It doesn't have a very large footprint even with the stand. Still takes less room than my upright did. Great battery life-I can vacuum the whole house and still have plenty of power to spare, and it has a second battery that charges inside the stand so you never have to worry about your vacuum dying mid chore. All the attachments and accessories fit inside the stand as well, so no messy tools hanging around or sticking out.Good suction power. I thought my last stick vac worked well until I used this, then I realized how much dirt I'd been missing. Easily transitions from hardwood to fluffy rugs with no issue. Sucks up pine needles out of tightly woven rugs pretty well. And does very well on the cat hair on their kitty towers.But best of all it empties itself! Even with every other canister style vacuum, there is always some dust that gets loose, or you have to reach up and pull out a fuzz ball. Not anymore! Just place it back on its stand and it does the rest. Where has this feature been my whole life?So yes, I am 100% in love with a vacuum. 5 0.208397 0.452423 im, love, vacuum, dont, get, wrong, ive, always, fan, technology, enjoy, new, gadget, thing, suck, best, way, using, upright, vacuum, nearly, two, decade, last, year, decided, time, upgrade, cordless, stick, vac, house, small, ive, removed, carpet, decent, vacuum, thing, blow, waterit, doesnt, large, footprint, even, stand, still, take, le, room, upright, great, battery, lifei, vacuum, whole, house, still, plenty, power, spare, second, battery, charge, inside, stand, never, worry, vacuum, dying, mid, chore, attachment, accessory, fit, inside, stand, well, messy, tool, hanging, around, sticking, outgood, suction, power, thought, last, stick, vac, worked, well, used, realized, 61 62 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-05-24 CDF3 Nice vacuum with a lot of features The LG CordZero is a nice vacuum cleaner with quite a few features. Taking the vacuum out of the box was fairly easy and straight forward. Setting up the unit is fairly easy, but I’d highly suggest reading the manual. There are a lot of things I would have missed if I had not read the manual. The charging base station is pretty much already assembled out of the box. The only labor involved for the base station is placing the gaskets on the bottom of the base plate, and setting the charing base station onto the base plate. The vacuum does a fairly decent job on the different floors I used it on. It did OK on carpet, but I felt it could use a bit more power. This was even after I cracked it up to Power Mode and then to Turbo Mode. I was able to use it to clean dirt and debris from my hardwood floors. I was a bit nervous using it on my hardwood floors because I only have the Universal Floor Nozzle. I had some debris that got caught underneath the nozzle and slightly scratched an area of my hardwood floors. Perhaps I may look into getting the Slim Hard Floor Nozzle that didn’t come with the unit I have. After I vacuumed the hardwood floors, I then used the mop pads to clean them. The water reservoir isn’t as large as a floor cleaner I own by a different manufacturer. I assumed I would have to fill it up a few times while mopping the floors. I was wrong, and it was enough to clean all of the hardwood floors and tile floors. It did a good job of disbursing the right amount of water. There’s a button to adjust the amount of water you want disbursed while mopping the floors. The mop pads turn in a circular direction, which you cannot adjust the speed at which they spin. The mop nozzle also comes with LED lights on the front that illuminate onto the floor while in use. The charging base station has a nice feature of automatically emptying the debris from the vacuum into a dust bag. Once the bag becomes full overtime, it will have to be disgarded. There’s no way to empty the bags and reuse them because they have a plastic slide rail attached to the top of each bag. I wish the bags were reusable or if they could have used a plastic bin that can be emptied. Over time the price of buying new bags might be costly. I empty most of the debris manually from the vacuum itself into a regular trash can before placing it on the base station. The charging base station comes in auto mode to empty the vacuum when placing in on the base station. This can become quite annoying because every time I place the vacuum on the charging station, it goes into the bag empty mode which is quite loud. I’ve now switched it to manual mode by pressing the Select Mode button on top of the base station. Now when I place the vacuum on the base station to charge, I don’t have to worry about it going into the bag empty mode. You also can’t remove the vacuum from the base station until it goes through the complete cycle. With it being in manual mode now, I don’t have to worry about that anymore. The vacuum also comes with an app that allows you to see the charging status, vacuum history, and other useful information. It was a bit tricky setting it up. I scanned the QR code on that’s located on the vacuum. It automatically took me to the App Store where I was able to download the app. Once I was able to open the app, it then asked me to create an account. Locating my vacuum was easy. I scanned the same QR code again using the app. By using the app to scan the QR code, it now adds the vacuum to your account. The tricky pars was setting up the WiFi. You have connect to the vacuum’s built in WiFi. When it asks for a password you have to type the last 4 characters of the WiFi name of your device twice with no spaces. After that, then the WiFi process is complete. Overall I’m pleased with the vacuum. With the power being slightly lower than what I expected, it has other features that make up for it. It’s still a bit on the pricey side though. 5 0.193541 0.410325 nice, vacuum, lot, feature, lg, cordzero, nice, vacuum, cleaner, quite, feature, taking, vacuum, box, fairly, easy, straight, forward, setting, unit, fairly, easy, highly, suggest, reading, manual, lot, thing, would, missed, read, manual, charging, base, station, pretty, much, already, assembled, box, labor, involved, base, station, Buy. 1 0.012158 0.952771 absolutely, horrendous, buy, vacuum, struggle, vacuum, anything, cheerio, dust, literally, anything, read, review, watch, youtube, video, buy absolutely horrendous do not buy this vacuum it struggles to vacuum anything cheerios dust literally anything read the reviews watch the youtube videos do not buy
63 64 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2022-09-01 CJM2 Great When it Works So many appliances now are highly advanced and innovative. They come with mobile apps and lengthy instructions. This vacuum is something new for sure. I am usually not a huge fan of mobile apps for everything but knowing when the vacuum is fully charged or has an issue by checking my phone can be handy sometimes.\r\n\r\n As for the vacuum itself; it works well. I, personally, had no issues with suction. Honestly, I tried all the settings and I can't imagine why anyone would need to use the Turbo function. I can't see how anyone would use that for regular day to day vacuuming. It's REALLY high intensity. The normal, basic setting is just fine for most floors, rugs and carpets. I think the suction is exceptionally good actually. It's amazing how you think something is clean and then see how much dust and hair gets picked up. \r\n\r\nThe pet attachment is handy for small areas that just need a quick clean up. The mop feature is interesting, I probably won't use that one as often. It does work just fine but I just don't like the extra clean-up of the device afterwards. What I really like this for is stairs. It's so much easier to maneuver than a regular vacuum and I can get the corners and angles of the stairs much easier and faster. \r\n\r\nThe automatic empty feature is pretty cool but I find that it only completely emptied the dust container about half the time. Even after compressing it and making sure it's not too full. Sometimes there will still be a bit of debris left that has to be manually emptied. However, that was not a big problem for me. I like the compact base station where you can store and charge the vacuum and all the attachments in one place. It's easy to assemble, charge and to set up.\r\n\r\n My main issue is the sensitivity of the vacuum. It reminds me of old smartphones that had the capability to take very high-resolution photos but the phone itself would practically shut down when you used the feature. A lot of high-tech devices have this issue. They design the appliance to be very advanced but, counterintuitively - also too sensitive, so that it requires constant maintenance just to keep it functional on the most basic level. This is a big issue for me because when I clean; I want to get it done quickly and efficiently. I don't like stopping every few minutes and having to check the vacuum because it's saying it's "blocked". Only to have to completely disassemble the entire thing to figure out what tiny bit of fluff is supposedly "blocking" it. The usual culprit of the "blockage" is a tiny dust bunny or some barely visible piece of fluff that I have to spend 5 minutes and a tweezer to find. More times that I like; I had to give up and just use my regular vacuum cleaner to finish my chores. A big deal breaker for me because I don't like having to walk on eggshells around my appliances because I'm not sure if they'll work or allow me to get my tasks done that day without issue. That is my only but most major con.\r\n\r\nOther than that; this vacuum is very good for basic tasks and day to day cleaning. Great for stairs and small areas. Good suction and helpful features and attachments. 4 0.211672 0.399729 great, work, many, appliance, highly, advanced, innovative, come, mobile, apps, lengthy, instruction, vacuum, something, new, sure, usually, huge, fan, mobile, apps, everything, knowing, vacuum, fully, charged, issue, checking, phone, handy, sometimes, vacuum, work, well, personally, issue, suction, honestly, tried, setting, cant, imagine, anyone, would, need, use, turbo, function, cant, see, anyone, would, use, regular, day, day, vacuuming, really, high, intensity, normal, basic, setting, fine, floor, rug, carpet, think, 64 65 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2023-05-17 CWP Amazing Cordless Vacuum The technology in this LG cordless vacuum is absolutely amazing. I have used this vacuum several times in the past week on the same area and it still continues to pick up material every vacuum (simply meaning that it really deep cleans)The vacuum took a few minutes to set up and get working - it’s not simply plug and play, you actually have to follow the directions. It has multiple attachments that fit into the base unit as well as two separate batteries. The battery in the vacuum charges first and then the auxiliary or spare battery charges second - which makes perfect sense.There are multiple suction levels (Normal, enhanced, turbo) and they all work very well. The highest suction level is likely much more than will ever be needed. The only trouble I really had was hooking the vacuum up to the wifi, I simply couldn’t get it to connect - but why do I need wifi to tell me the status of the vacuum, just not necessary.The base unit has a self empty feature this is amazing - with the press of a button your canister on the vacuum will be emptied into a bag in the base unit keep everything very clean - so one may say big deal, well it really is a big deal. I hate emptying my canister into the trash and getting all that dust floating everywhere, with this feature all of that is eliminated.Overall this is an amazing vacuum and maybe a bit expensive but worth every penny in my opinion. I highly recommend this LG vacuum. 5 0.208149 0.413085 amazing, cordless, vacuum, technology, lg, cordless, vacuum, absolutely, amazing, used, vacuum, several, time, past, week, area, still, continues, pick, material, every, vacuum, simply, meaning, really, deep, cleansthe, vacuum, took, minute, set, get, working, simply, plug, play, actually, follow, direction, multiple, attachment, fit, 66 67 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2023-08-06 CamT Worth the money! This thing makes vacuuming and mopping so easy! I love the stand for it and the fact it empties itself after every use. I didn’t realize how much dog hair I had in my carpet until I used this, especially after using the 20 sec turbo. It’s very easy to maneuver and light wait.\n\nYou do have to be careful about not vacuuming up larger objects (1-2 inches long/thick). I had something get stuck in the vacuum which stopped the suction from working. I was able to troubleshoot the issue through the ThinQ app though and it’s super easy to disassemble and remove the obstruction. The head of the vacuum is a little smaller than my other cordless but works great. The suction is amazing on this little machine. The vacuum comes with a docking station that holds an extra battery that charges, all the accessories fit inside the station and the vacuum charges while docked. After you are finished and hang the vacuum up the special feature will suck the debris from the tank and dispose of it in a bag below. Seriously so totally like “the Jetson” like. 69 70 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2022-12-25 Ceyda All sweep! Cordless feature with 2 charges and automated trash box are my favorites with this model. It is lightweight and easy to maneuver. 70 71 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2022-12-16 Charpie Broke Within 3 Months Within 3 months it failed to dispense in the auto-dispensing tower. Unfortunate, since that's what we liked about this vacuum. 79 80 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2023-02-19 D.D Very well thought out. Works great. This is a brilliantly designed and beautiful looking unit. The base is freestanding and holds and charge the stick. When you put the stick in the base, it starts to suction out the debris in the canister into a bad. You never have to empty the bin with this unit. It also stores the extra accessories and extra battery.The stick has great suction and is pretty quiet for being a cordless stick vac. It rolls around the floor smoothly. It can pick up dog fur, crumbs and dust. It won’t pick up anything that is taller than the vac as it has to be able to roll over it to get it. I have a puppy so I am constantly picking up dog fur everywhere. I wouldn’t try to pick up anything wet as it is not designed for that.The battery has more than enough run time for me to do a thorough cleaning on my hardwood floors. It works really well and well thought out. I love this device. 5 0.333048 0.291164 well, thought, work, great, brilliantly, designed, beautiful, looking, unit, base, freestanding, hold, charge, stick, put, stick, base, start, suction, debris, canister, bad, never, empty, bin, unit, also, store, extra, accessory, extra, batterythe, stick, great, suction, pretty, quiet, cordless, stick, vac, roll, around, floor, smoothly, pick, dog, fur, crumb, dust, pick, anything, taller, vac, able, roll, get, puppy, constantly, picking, dog, fur, everywhere, try, pick, anything, wet, designed, thatthe, battery, enough, run, time, thorough, cleaning, hardwood, floor, work, really, well, well, thought, love, device very well thought out works great this is a brilliantly designed and beautiful looking unit the base is freestanding and holds and charge the stick when you put the stick in the base it starts to suction out the debris in the canister into a bad you never have to empty the bin with this unit it also stores the extra accessories and extra batterythe stick has great suction and is pretty quiet for being a cordless stick vac it rolls around the floor smoothly it can pick up dog fur crumbs and dust it won’t pick up anything that is taller than the vac as it has to be able to roll over it to get it i have a puppy so i am constantly picking up dog fur everywhere i wouldn’t try to pick up anything wet as it is not designed for thatthe battery has more than enough run time for me to do a thorough cleaning on my hardwood floors it works really well and well thought out i love this device

81 83 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-05-24 DMNFL Space Saver and Great Features The LG - CordZero Cordless Stick Vacuum is a great vacuum for my entire house. I had a stick vacuum and a traditional vacuum and I used them in different levels of the house (upstairs/downstairs). I have all hard floors downstairs and all carpet upstairs. So I kept the regular vacuum upstairs and the stick vacuum downstairs, which I considered inferior to the stick for carpet. Don't get me wrong, the stick vacuum that I had worked well, but the regular vacuum was better on carpet. This LG - CordZero Cordless Stick Vacuum solved the need for having two. The LG - CordZero Cordless Stick Vacuum works as well on carpet as my traditional vacuum and as well on hard floors as my stick vacuum. The power is what I need for all of it.\n\nThe thing that I like the most is that this automatically empties when you put it back in the tower. I never realized how convenient this is. You just put it back in and it empties and the tower tells you when to empty the bag. The battery life has been great and there is a second battery and a place in the tower to charge it, so you never have a time that the vacuum is out of commission. The app is also great. Connection was easy it has many stats, down to how many times you've used it and how long it ran. I would recommend the The LG - CordZero Cordless Stick Vacuum to anyone. 5 0.219423 0.360786 space, saver, great, feature, lg, cordzero, cordless, stick, vacuum, great, vacuum, entire, house, stick, 86 88 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-05-19 DarR Ingenious! My vacuum, mops and cleaning accessories are all stored in a messy cabinet and are not very accessible. This cord zero does not only clean our messy 3-child home, it also organizes our cleaning tools to keep the house clean. \n\nThe station itself looks good. This all-in-one station is not something I can and should keep in the closet—and I actually like it that way. It looks good out in a corner where we can easily pull the vacuum out for cereal grain spills. The design looks neat, the other nozzles and connecting tools can be stored in the station compartments, and the vacuum automatically charges once you park it. The vacuum can automatically empty itself (or you can manually trigger it). It even has a charging / storage for an extra battery which, all you clean freaks with kids out there know how important it is to have a charged EXTRA BATTERY. \n\nPerformance-wise, it is great. I have to use it on TURBO all the time though. The normal mode just does not cut it for me. Maybe I can use that to suck other things? I don’t even know what “other” things are. All I know is, when it comes to vacuuming, it’s either it sucks it or it doesn’t. The turbo does it and for cleaning regularly a 1500 sq ft space of wood floor, I have never encountered having to even use the spare battery. Another winner for me is the mop tool. You pre-wet the attachment cloths, put water in the bin and I mop away! There is no turbo mode for mopping, but it does the job as well! And I have been using the mop for 40 -45 minutes at a time and I do not run out of battery. This is me going through each sliver of space, slowly on the floor and it mops nicely and consistently. Oh, best of all, it is CORDLESS. I do not have to keep transferring the plug or have to hold a cord up and around me to get mopping done.\n\nThis is just so well-thought out. Even the bags and filter replacement system is easy (which we have not really done after a week of use, because we don’t think about it--- the vacuum empties itself, remember?) It makes the lady of the house happy, and it makes us all happy too. \n\nWe just threw away all our cleaning appliances—corded mops and other vacuum sticks. This is what design is supposed to be. All-in-one—It just made cleaning fun and easy. 5 0.189100 0.428312 ingenious, vacuum, mop, cleaning, accessory, stored, messy, cabinet, accessible, cord, zero, clean, messy, 3child, home, also, 88 90 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2023-07-16 Darrell Veasley Horrible product came defective... trying to resolve buyer beware 1 0.022232 0.930836 horrible, product, came, defective, trying, resolve, buyer, beware horrible product came defective trying to resolve buyer beware
89 91 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2022-10-14 Dave Edmiston Not worth it I like stick vacuums, sort of. Some of them are pretty good, but none of them are as good as a regular corded vacuum. The problem with stick vacs is that their mechanisms are basically the same as a robot (Rooma) but on a stick instead of in a robot.I ended up with stick vacuums at three different residences this year (long story). This one should have been my favorite since it's the most high-end, but it wasn't the best vacuum of the three.The suction isn't great with this one, so it doesn't clean around the floorboards very well whether it's on the carpet or hard flooring. This means I had to do a lap around the house with a broom to clean the baseboards, which totally defeats the purpose of a vacuum.Let me back up for a minute to talk about the setup...I'm one of those guys who reads the instructions. I like documentation and I'm paranoid that I'm going to break something expensive, so I read the docs. But I met my match with this product. The amount of documentation was daunting. They could have made a move out of it, but it would have been a three part set of three trilogies like Star Wars. Yes, there was that much documentation. Too bad the docs didn't really provide that much insight.The docs for the mop attachment were pretty good. And that attachment was honestly pretty cool. What it didn't clarify very well though was that the water in the mop attachment was really just to wash away whatever product you applied to the floor. If you wanted the floor to shine, you had to squirt it with something like Mop & Glow first. Fair enough.I feel like I'm rambling a little bit. Sorry about that.One of the other things that bothered me was the cost of the consumables. I would have loved it if the self-emptying feature emptied the vac into something reusable, but it emptied into a special bag and the replacement bags were really hard to find. Last I checked, the bags weren't available on Amazon but I found them at a local vacuum shop for something like $30 for a 2-pack. Not interested. I quit looking after that and just emptied the vac into the trash by hand. It was easier and cheaper that way.The one thing they really got right though was the attachment storage. You just opened the doors on the tall base and there was a home for each of the attachments. Nice.So all in all, this vacuum looks pretty cool and it's easy enough to operate. My complaints are: an insane amount of disorganized documentation, expensive consumables, and middle of the road suction. And my praises are: a pretty decent wet mop solution, an attractive base (if you're into droids), and superior storage for the attachments.None of this adds up to nearly a thousand bucks worth of value to me. 3 0.183729 0.475395 worth, like, stick, vacuum, sort, pretty, good, none, good, regular, corded, vacuum, problem, stick, vac, mechanism, basically, robot, rooma, stick, instead, roboti, ended, stick, vacuum, three, different, residence, year, long, story, one, favorite, since, highend, wasnt, best, vacuum, threethe, suction, isnt, great, one, doesnt, clean, around, floorboard, well, whether, carpet, hard, flooring, mean, lap, around, house, broom, clean, baseboard, totally, defeat, purpose, vacuumlet, back, minute, talk, setupim, one, guy, read, instruction, like, documentation, im, paranoid, im, going, break, something, expensive, read, doc, met, match, product, amount, documentation, daunting, could, made, move, would, three, part, set, three, trilogy, like, star, war, yes, you applied to the floor if you wanted the floor to shine you had to squirt it with something like mop glow first fair enoughi feel like im rambling a little bit sorry about thatone of the other things that bothered me was the cost of the consumables i would have loved it if the selfemptying feature emptied the vac into something reusable but it emptied into a special bag and the replacement bags were really hard to find last i checked the bags werent available on amazon but i found them at a local vacuum shop for something like 30 for a 2pack not interested i quit looking after that and just emptied the vac into the trash by hand it was easier and cheaper that waythe one thing they really got right though was the attachment storage you just opened the doors on the tall base and there was a home for each of the attachments niceso all in all this vacuum looks pretty cool and its easy enough to operate my complaints arean insane amount of disorganized documentation expensive consumables and middle of the road suction and my praises area pretty decent wet mop solution an attractive base if youre into droids and superior storage for the attachmentsnone of this adds up to nearly a thousand bucks worth of value to me
90 92 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2023-05-29 Dave Thom Very nice cordless vacuum This is a really nice cordless vacuum model. It is really sleek looking and my wife doesn’t mind having it on display, unlike our other vacuum that has been relegated to the closet. It was easy to put together and set up. It actually had quite a bit of power when you use the turbo button. I like that it has additional attachments. It works great on our carpet and on our tile. The only downside I’ve noticed is that having pets seems to make it clog from the fur sometimes. And another thing that I’m not really happy about is the bags. While it did come with three of them, they are very small. And they are also not reusable, I can’t empty them and then reuse them. I have a large family with animals, this just isn’t economical for us to have to buy new bags that hold so little debris. I’ve had it for a short time, and I’m already on my last bag that was included. I do appreciate the design and overall functionality of this device though. I love that it self empties and has such a long charge life. I just can’t see having to keep purchasing the bags constantly. 4 0.271258 0.369577 nice, cordless, vacuum, really, nice, cordless, vacuum, model, really, sleek, looking, wife, mind, display, unlike, vacuum, relegated, closet, easy, put, together, set, actually, quite, bit, power, use, turbo, button, like, additional, attachment, work, great, carpet, tile, downside, noticed, pet, seems, make, clog, fur, sometimes, another, thing, really, happy, bag, come, three, small, also, reusable, empty, reuse, large, family, animal, economical, u, buy, new, bag, hold, little, debris, short, time, already, last, bag, included, appreciate, design, overall, functionality, device, though, love, self, empty, long, charge, life, see, keep, purchasing, bag, constantly very nice cordless vacuum this is a really nice cordless vacuum model it is really sleek looking and my wife doesn’t mind having it on display unlike our other vacuum that has been relegated to the closet it was easy to put together and set up it actually had quite a bit of power when you use the turbo button i like that it has additional attachments it works great on our carpet and on our tile the only downside i’ve noticed is that having pets seems to make it clog from the fur sometimes and another thing that i’m not really happy about is the bags while it did come with three of them they are very small and they are also not reusable i can’t empty them and then reuse them i have a large family with animals this just isn’t economical for us to have to buy new bags that hold so little debris i’ve had it for a short time and i’m already on my last bag that was included i do appreciate the design and overall functionality of this device though i love that it self empties and has such a long charge life i just can’t see having to keep purchasing the bags constantly

99 101 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2023-02-20 EarlH Ultra-convenient, still not a real vacuum Using this thing is a breeze. The all-in-one stand is a new bare minimum feature I would expect from stick vacuums moving forward. It really solves so many problems for stick-vacs (ie. clean & easy emptying, charging, tool storage, extra battery!!). Plus its looks are premium and second to none. Much more mature aesthetic than Dyson imo. Having owned a Dyson v7, this one is miles ahead in virtually every way.\nHowever, this is not a real vacuum. It can't compete for the price point against a high quality canister like the Miele C3. Seriously, this is 75% of real vacuum at the very best. Personally, I would choose a plug-in all day over this. But, for those who know they want a battery-vac, or those who already have a working plug in which they want to add to, this is as good as it gets.\nFive Stars. 5 0.305341 0.346356 ultraconvenient, still, real, vacuum, using, thing, breeze, allinone, stand, new, bare, minimum, feature, would, expect, stick, vacuum, moving, forward, really, solves, many, problem, stickvacs, ie, clean, easy, emptying, charging, tool, storage, extra, battery, plus, look, premium, second, none, much, mature, aesthetic, dyson, imo, owned, dyson, v7, one, mile, ahead, virtually, every, way, however, real, vacuum, cant, compete, price, point, high, quality, canister, like, miele, c3, seriously, 75, real, vacuum, best, personally, would, choose, plugin, day, know, want, batteryvac, already, working, plug, want, add, good, get, five, star \n \nultraconvenient still not a real vacuum using this thing is a breeze the allinone stand is a new bare minimum feature i would expect from stick vacuums moving forward it really solves so many problems for stickvacs ie clean easy emptying charging tool storage extra battery plus its looks are premium and second to none much more mature aesthetic than dyson imo having owned a dyson v7 this one is miles ahead in virtually every way however this is not a real vacuum it cant compete for the price point against a high quality canister like the miele c3 seriously this is 75 of real vacuum at the very best personally i would choose a plugin all day over this but for those who know they want a batteryvac or those who already have a working plug in which they want to add to this is as good as it gets five stars

110 112 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2022-08-07 Finch Expensive, convenient, could use some improvement I like this vacuum. I don't love this vacuum. And at this price point, I really should love it.Lot's of other reviews cover some great features, so I'm going to stick mostly to what I think needs improvement.CONS1) the regular roller attachment does not pick up on smooth surfaces well at all. I have my cat bowls in the kitchen and they often end up with cat food around them. When I'm vacuuming I take this to the kitchen to try to get all the bits of cat food, it seriously won't pick up any of the cat food on my floor. Something about the smooth floor and the largish object, it just won't. It pushes it around and that's very silly for a vacuum so expensive.2) I do love that they tried with the mop attachment but without heat I think it's kind of meh. I know it would probably be impossible to make it heated. The mopping experience is very lackluster. If you have anything stuck on your floor it takes a very long time for it to get it up. It's okay for a quick rinse but not a big cleaning.3) The weighting of this vacuum is a tad awkward. We have another similar style vacuum and the balance is much better. This one might be uncomfortable for folks who are less stable on their feet or aren't as strong (children, elderly, other mobility considerations).PROSThis is not an all inclusive list, there are many good things about it.1) the extendable wand is slightly longer than a very similar vacuum like this that we have. That makes it more comfortable for my partner to whole who is taller than me.2) Accessory storage. I think the actual stand is pretty ugly. But the fact that all the accessories store inside is pretty great.3) Suction on carpet is pretty good. Like I said, a bit dicey on harder floors for some reason but overall suction is pretty good (not amazing but pretty good). 3 0.219200 0.436840 expensive, convenient, could, use, improvement, like, vacuum, dont, love, vacuum, price, point, really, love, itlots, review, cover, great, feature, im, going, stick, mostly, think, need, improvementcons1, regular, roller, attachment, pick, smooth, 120 122 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2022-09-07 Gjohnson12 Great vacuum This LG Zero Cord Vacuum is amazing! It is a cordless vacuum which makes it very easy to clean because u can pick it up and go anywhere with it. There are two batteries that come with it so you can change it out when one is done for uninterrupted cleaning. There is all in one tower. The tower serves as a battery charging station that charges two batteries. You can clean and charge them at the same time with 120 minutes.it also conveniently and discretely stores tools and accessories. Inside the tower there is also an auto empty that empties the dirt cup when the vacuum is docked.there are three vacuum bags that come with it for emptying debris. it has Kompressor technology that compacts the dirt inside the dust bin. It has one touch press button that turns it on/off or you can select turbo power mode. The vacuum has a telescopic wand so you can adjust it to reach those high places. This vacuum is also a mop! It comes with mop heads and a power mop nozzle . You can mop hardwood floor with this and you can easily vacuum them too. It cleans carpets with ease and picks up pet hair very well too with the pet nozzle. It has Wi-Fi ThinQ which helps so you can run your vacuum for maintenance and diagnostics for upkeep ! 128 130 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2023-07-13 HeatherRN Love this Vac! I recently recieved this vacuum in the mail. It is perfect. It is lightweight and easy to use. It does not take up a lot of space and the attachments are easy stored inside the tower. Battery lasts about 30 minutes when running nonstop. There is also an extra battery if you need to vacuum longer. I love that I can take this vacuum anywhere without having to worry about tripping on a cord. The only problem I have found is that it does clog pretty easily but it is easy to unclog. The vacuum slides apart with a push of a button and you can remove the clogs. The suction power is really good and it also has different speeds of suction depending on what your cleaning. I highly recommend this vacuum especially for someone who isn’t able to lift much weight. I use it in my car, Rv and home with no problems. It also empties itself inside a bag that is stored in the tower so your not always having to empty it after each use. 5 0.400933 0.249950 love, vac, recently, recieved, vacuum, mail, perfect, lightweight, easy, use, take, lot, space, attachment, easy, stored, inside, tower, battery, last, 30, minute, running, nonstop, also, extra, battery, need, vacuum, longer, love, take, vacuum, anywhere, without, worry, tripping, cord, problem, found, clog, pretty, easily, easy, unclog, vacuum, slide, apart, push, button, remove, clog, suction, power, really, good, also, different, speed, suction, depending, cleaning, highly, recommend, vacuum, especially, someone, able, lift, much, weight, use, car, rv, home, problem, also, empty, inside, bag, stored, tower, always, empty, use \n \nlove this vac i recently recieved this vacuum in the mail it is perfect it is lightweight and easy to use it does not take up a lot of space and the attachments are easy stored inside the tower battery lasts about 30 minutes when running nonstop there is also an extra battery if you need to vacuum longer i love that i can take this vacuum anywhere without having to worry about tripping on a cord the only problem i have found is that it does clog pretty easily but it is easy to unclog the vacuum slides apart with a push of a button and you can remove the clogs the suction power is really good and it also has different speeds of suction depending on what your cleaning i highly recommend this vacuum especially for someone who isn’t able to lift much weight i use it in my car rv and home with no problems it also empties itself inside a bag that is stored in the tower so your not always having to empty it after each use

134 136 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-05-25 Idoc Compact rechargeable self emptying vacuum I found the LG CordZero All in One to be quite capable. It cleans hardwood and tile easily. Using the mop head to clean was a breeze on our hardwood and kitchen flooring. The battery life was good using only 1 bar after vacuuming the whole house. I like how lightweight it is and makes cleaning the stairs fast and easy. It struggles just a bit on low pile rugs, but was able to do the job. A pile adjustment would be a welcome addition. The turbo switch offers more suction when needed. The ability to use the vaccine without the stick extention is great for upholstry and automotive vacuuming. \nAs for looks the charging stand will be at home in any modern decor. The stand itself is clean looking and compact. The vacuum automatically empties it's contents and charges when it is docked. The stand hold the vacuum with the stick extension and vacuum head without disassembly. The accessories are stored neatly on the right side hidden from sight under the side door. 136 138 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-09-04 JGPARK Lg Zero I love this vacuum better than dyson to me. Must but 5 0.866700 0.043977 lg, zero, love, vacuum, better, dyson, must \n \nlg zero i love this vacuum better than dyson to me must
137 139 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2022-11-22 JHCCAZ CordZero vacs are QUIET! Love Auto Empty bagging! We now have three households in our extended family with the Cord Zero all in one Auto Empty model.. I need encouragement to keep up with dusting, and so I appreciate the convenience ofa cordless vac but I hate dealing with emptying any Bagless vac which are the most popular these days. The feature of having bagged and filtered emptying into the recharging station is a great solution. By the way, the station also works for emptying other Cord Zero models, even the non-compressor units seem to work fine. So we keep our previous model upstairs and use the downstairs Auto Empty station for it as well.\r\n\r\nThe other big point, which LG doesn't seem to promote very much, is that these vacuums are notably quieter than most competitors. We previously had one of the competing models from the well known deluxe brand, and I hated it because it was so loud and very shrill sounding. The LG is deceptively powerful considering how much quieter it runs. Of course you can boost the speed, but even on Turbo the LG is not as hurtful to the ears. Note also that dogs and cats are more sensitive to loud high pitched noises than we are, they don't run away from this vacuum like they did with the other one. This quietness benefit is hard to prove from just reading the websites. Check out the Project Farm video comparison on YouTube where he reports the measured sound level of all tested units. LG is at or near the quietest and is still competitive in other performance categories. 5 0.165620 0.544157 cordzero, vac, quiet, love, auto, empty, bagging, three, household, extended, family, cord, zero, one, auto, empty, model, need, encouragement, keep, dusting, appreciate, convenience, ofa, cordless, vac, hate, dealing, emptying, bagless, vac, popular, day, feature, bagged, filtered, emptying, recharging, station, great, solution, way, station, also, work, emptying, cord, zero, model, even, noncompressor, unit, seem, work, fine, keep, previous, model, upstairs, use, downstairs, auto, empty, station, well, big, point, lg, doesnt, seem, promote, much, vacuum, notably, quieter, competitor, previously, one, competing, model, well, known, deluxe, brand, hated, loud, shrill, sounding, lg, deceptively, powerful, considering, much, quieter, run, course, boost, speed, even, turbo, lg, hurtful, ear, note, also, dog, cat, sensitive, loud, high, pitched, noise, dont, run, away, vacuum, like, one, quietness, benefit, hard, prove, reading, website, check, project, farm, video, comparison, youtube, report, measured, sound, level, tested, unit, lg, near, quietest, still, competitive, performance, category \n \ncordzero vacs are quiet love auto empty bagging we now have three households in our extended family with the cord zero all in one auto empty model i need encouragement to keep up with dusting and so i appreciate the convenience ofa cordless vac but i hate dealing with emptying any bagless vac which are the most popular these days the feature of having bagged and filtered emptying into the recharging station is a great solution by the way the station also works for emptying other cord zero models even the noncompressor units seem to work fine so we keep our previous model upstairs and use the downstairs auto empty station for it as well\r the other big point which lg doesnt seem to promote very much is that these vacuums are notably quieter than most competitors we previously had one of the competing models from the well known deluxe brand and i hated it because it was so loud and very shrill sounding the lg is deceptively powerful considering how much quieter it runs of course you can boost the speed but even on turbo the lg is not as hurtful to the ears note also that dogs and cats are more sensitive to loud high pitched noises than we are they dont run away from this vacuum like they did with the other one this quietness benefit is hard to prove from just reading the websites check out the project farm video comparison on youtube where he reports the measured sound level of all tested units lg is at or near the quietest and is still competitive in other performance categories

142 144 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2021-11-28 JUSTMOM Love love Love this vacuum!!! About this LG CordZero Vacuum, I wish I have the ability to write down all the wonderful things about it. This is an outstanding vacuum no matter the user-friendly design, all the attached accessories, and the performance, all and all, this is the king!\r\nI mostly use a vacuum to clean up our house about twice a week, we have 50% carpet and 50% vinyl floor, with this vacuum I can use it on both surfaces. \r\nThe auto empty charging station is so well-made and very user-friendly, you can store the extra tools inside the station. \r\nThe auto empty design is really impressive! So convenient and really work perfectly, so after a few weeks, the vacuum still looks brand new!\r\nThe filter inside the vacuum is so easy to change or clean, there are so many extra nozzles and tools, all well-designed and high quality.\r\nThe most and the best is the owner's manual is so clear and easy to understand. \r\nOverall I highly recommend this vacuum! 5 0.610171 0.157632 love, love, love, vacuum, lg, cordzero, vacuum, wish, ability, write, wonderful, thing, outstanding, vacuum, matter, userfriendly, design, attached, accessory, performance, king, mostly, use, vacuum, clean, house, twice, week, 50, carpet, 50, vinyl, floor, vacuum, use, surface, auto, empty, charging, station, wellmade, userfriendly, store, extra, tool, inside, station, auto, empty, design, really, impressive, convenient, really, work, perfectly, week, vacuum, still, look, brand, new, filter, inside, vacuum, easy, change, clean, many, extra, nozzle, tool, welldesigned, high, quality, best, owner, manual, clear, easy, understand, overall, highly, recommend, vacuum love love love this vacuum about this lg cordzero vacuum i wish i have the ability to write down all the wonderful things about it this is an outstanding vacuum no matter the userfriendly design all the attached accessories and the performance all and all this is the king\r i mostly use a vacuum to clean up our house about twice a week we have 50 carpet and 50 vinyl floor with this vacuum i can use it on both surfaces \r \n \n the auto empty charging station is so wellmade and very userfriendly you can store the extra tools inside the station \r the auto empty design is really impressive so convenient and really work perfectly so after a few weeks the vacuum still looks brand new\r the filter inside the vacuum is so easy to change or clean there are so many extra nozzles and tools all welldesigned and high quality\r the most and the best is the owners manual is so clear and easy to understand \r overall i highly recommend this vacuum
143 145 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-05-25 Jack Expensive feature-rich with mediocre performance The LG Cordzero “all-in-one” system is an interesting (and expensive) idea that tries to accomplish all things you’d expect from vacuum cleaners. The package includes most of the items I’d usually need for everyday use, and the impressive base station, though being quite large and hefty, is feature rich. The attachments are good, and so is the ergonomics. It is a truly multifunctional tool.\nThe stick vacuum itself is well designed and well-balanced. The motor, near the top end, is very compact for its power and the telescopic handle makes it very easy to use. After using it to vacuum carpets and some tile floors I didn’t feel much fatigue compared to my other stick vacuums. The roller head (Universal Nozzle) can move around to reach a lot of hard to reach places. However, with “normal” operation I felt the suction power is not that great - with my “moderately clean” carpets with the usual dog hair etc. I frequently switched to the “Power” mode (and a few times to the “Turbo” mode). This drastically reduced the battery life and had to swap out the provided 2nd battery almost all the time. Without the 2nd battery and the charging station, this would have been a no-go from the very start. Of course, this depends on what type of carpets you have and how dirty they regularly get, but for me I’d appreciate it a bit more under Normal mode. But this is a drawback for almost all cordless vacuums I have used so far. The highly-touted Kompressor technology is just a manual lever that pushes down the debris inside dust bin. This helps pack more dust before I need emptying, but more me looked like an over-hyped idea. One thing to point out that the package does not include the slim hard-floor nozzle, so maybe that would be a better head to use for non-carpeted areas. However I did not have the means to try that out.\nAs for the Mop Nozzle - I have to say I’m quite disappointed with it. Only water can be used as the cleaning fluid, and the speed is fixed. This made it almost ineffective if there’s a speck of dirt in my tiled floor. For my use case, it was an ultra-low-duty attachment, and would only be useful if I could use it every single day. It is very very limited in its use, so if you plan to use it be wary.\nThe other “powered” head is the Pet Nozzle, which lists a lot of limitations in the manual (it can’t be used with clothing, bedding, leather sofas, cushions, carpet, vinyl flooring, tiles, marble) which made me wary to use it all. There are also crevice tools and a combination tool (crevice and brush) included as well which are very handy. Using these heads without the telescopic handle effectively transforms this into a handheld vacuum that I used to clean my car interior.\nThe charging/base station, as I mentioned earlier, is quite big and heavy. LF provides a plastic base with rubber feet to keep it standing, and mounting kit is there to tether it to a wall if needed. I did not have an issue with it as long it was not in a high-traffic area. The station, along with housing the stick vacuum, can charge the included extra battery, and has nifty ways to organize the tools/heads. The star feature is the Auto-empty functionality that automatically cleans out the dust bin from the vacuum body and puts it into a removable dust bag. I found the feature to be very useful (especially when I’m feeling lazy and wanted to create as little mess as possible) albeit noisy. By default the station performs this auto empty procedure every time the vacuum is docked, but this can be changed easily. The only drawback I saw was that the dust bag fills up quite easily and I’ll run out of those (only 3 are included) soon.\nIn terms of ease of use and smart features: I consider myself a tech-savvy person and am always looking forward to trying out new techs. But this vacuum left me baffled a number of times. For the first few days, I had to get the user manual to figure out what needs to be done. That’s the price you pay for getting a “feature” rich machine, but in my opinion this may leave people a bit frustrated. The LG ThingQ app does not add a lot of functionality - it can store cleaning history and can perform “Smart diagnosis”. But since I haven’t faced any functional issues with it I can’t comment how well it can actually solve problems.\nOverall, I like the LG Cordzero All-in-one system for trying to be an all-in-one solution. But I wish, for the price, I was getting a bit more performance. If you have a light-duty need this will be a very good solution, but given the price you have to really think about the pros and cons. This could have been great with the large feature-set, but its mediocre performance made it more gimmicky for my needs. 3 0.217128 0.411987 expensive, featurerich, mediocre, performance, lg, cordzero, allinone, system, interesting, expensive, idea, try, accomplish, thing, expect, vacuum, cleaner, package, includes, item, usually, need, everyday, use, impressive, base, station, though, quite, large, 144 146 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2022-10-16 Jack LG make some fine products; this is not one of them. LG make some fine products; this is not one of them.The user manual is terrible. To me the instructions are out of order. The line drawings are not clear. And in general it’s just bad. I thought the worst user manuals were in the software domain but this, relative to the complexity of the product, beats even the bad SW manuals.The stand requires too much space because of space required for doors on either side to swing out.There is very little actual vacuum even in turbo mode; it relies on the brushes to pick stuff up but then it cannot pull the stuff into the dust canister. Very light stuff (I think it’s carpet fibers mixed with dust does not pass into the dust canister and then backs up in the pipe between the floor brush part and the motor/vacuum part. The stuff in the pipe is easily blow out with a slight puff (which partially shows how poor the suction of the product is) but the stuff stuck in the motor unit that can’t get into the dust canister is nearly impossible to remove and it has to be done after about three minutes of use.This is a totally impractical product. I don’t know how LG let it go to market nor how it remains on the market (it probably won’t after all the suckers like me get burned).I have a vacuum cleaner I bought for $35 on sale at Walmart to use in a small condominium in Colorado that works far better that this. Moving the power cord of the $35 product, or my Panasonic and Hoover units I use at home, from outlet to outlet is a lot easier and done less frequently than fooling with the nearly impossible jams of this cordless unit.This came in so many parts and with such a poor user manual that I let it sit for a long time before attempting to assemble and use it. The Amazon return date has passed so I might take it to a thrift store for a slight tax deduction but I really hate to think about someone else wasting even far less money than I have on this product. Although, for me, this is not a significant financial hit, I am still angry that I have wasted nearly $1K on this thing (I guess I should be angry mostly at myself for letting the return date pass but the poor user manual contributed to this).I strongly recommend you stay away from this product. 1 0.150853 0.524192 lg, make, fine, product, one, lg, make, fine, product, one, themthe, user, manual, 145 147 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2023-02-25 Jamie Sikora DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!!!!!!!!!! If I could give this ZERO stars, I would. The suction mechanism on this device is AWFUL. Wanna vacuum 4 pieces of sand and then 6 dog hairs? SORRY! YOU CAN'T! You have to repeatedly CLEAN OUT THE NOZZLE AFTER EVERY 2 SWIPES OF THE FLOOR. The automatic cleaner doesn't empty the bin completely. Dirt falls out of the vacuum head when placing it back in the stand. Did you want to vacuum up that granule of laundry crystals? Here's how you can successfully get rid of the laundry crystal; after pushing it around with the vacuum head 67 times, pick the vacuum UP, and lay the head DIRECTLY on TOP of the crystal; when this doesn't work after 32 attempts, simply bend over and pick up the crystal with your HANDS then throw it in your garbage! Cinshy! We contacted LG about our issues and they asked us to return the vacuum. We waited 2 weeks to get the box. Another week to get the return label. It then took 3 weeks for them to "repair" the device and return it to us UNREPAIRED. SAME FREAKING ISSUES!!!!!!!!! If you like feeling rage and seeing red while vacuuming; if you enjoy having to tear apart and clean the suction nozzle on your vacuum every 5 seconds; if you enjoy slipping in your tears as you try to use this POS vacuum; if you want to be borderline homicidal while trying to suck a piece of hair off your floor; if you love watching a thousand dollars go out the window, then this is the vacuum for you. Me, personally, I hate it. It's awful. LG sucks. Their customer service sucks, too. Thanks for not just one, but TWO, crappy devices without suction.
