146 148 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2023-06-25 Jamieberg1451 It’s a good vacuum I wanted to love this. I’d been so excited for it to arrive, and patiently waited for my husband to put it together. (Took him about 20 minutes.) \r\n\r\nThe good:\r\n- it’s quiet. SO quiet, that I thought it wasn’t working, u til I noticed the internal dust cup filling up. \r\n- it’s lightweight. I have owned 2 other cordless vacuums and this one is the lightest by far. \r\n- since it vacuums itself, I have yet to have a clog - something that I was having frequently with other brands. \r\n- all of its accessories are stored right in the unit, making them easy to store and find when I need them. Again, other vacuum parts have been difficult to manage. \r\n- comes with 2 batteries. My house is small, so I’ve never run out of battery while using it. But having a spare on hand is very nice. \r\n\r\nRoom for improvement:\r\n- the dust cup is tiny. It fills up way faster than the battery runs out. \r\n- while it’s nice the height is adjustable, it only fits on the base at the smallest size. So it’s a bit tedious taking it on and off the base. \r\n- the internal dust storage bin is very small, and I really wish the bags were reusable. Seems very wasteful. \r\n- while it’s fancy that the vacuum cleans itself, it takes a silly amount of time to return to the base, lower the height, hook it on the base, and wait for it to empty. It’s much easier to walk to the nearest trash can, empty it, and continue cleaning. \r\n\r\nThis is a good vacuum. It works well. I can feel the intensity change as I move from carpet to hardwood and back again. I just don’t love it, some of the features seem a bit unnecessary. If you really want to have the fanciest vacuum available, this one absolutely suits you. If not, you may find it better to find something a bit less fancy. 3 0.218978 0.420732 good, vacuum, wanted, love, excited, arrive, patiently, waited, husband, put, together, took, 20, minute, good, quiet, quiet, thought, working, u, til, noticed, internal, dust, cup, filling, lightweight, owned, 2, cordless, vacuum, one, lightest, far, since, vacuum, yet, clog, something, frequently, brand, accessory, stored, right, unit, making, easy, store, find, need, vacuum, part, difficult, manage, come, 2, battery, house, small, never, run, battery, using, spare, hand, nice, room, improvement, dust, cup, tiny, fill, way, faster, battery, run, nice, height, adjustable, fit, base, smallest, size, bit, tedious, taking, base, internal, dust, storage, bin, small, really, wish, bag, reusable, seems, wasteful, fancy, vacuum, clean, take, silly, amount, time, return, base, lower, height, hook, base, wait, empty, much, easier, walk, nearest, trash, empty, continue, cleaning, good, vacuum, work, well, feel, intensity, change, move, carpet, hardwood, back, love, feature, seem, bit, unnecessary, really, want, fanciest, vacuum, available, one, absolutely, suit, may, find, better, find, something, bit, le, fancy it’s a good vacuum i wanted to love this i’d been so excited for it to arrive and patiently waited for my husband to put it together took him about 20 minutes \r the good\r it’s quiet so quiet that i thought it wasn’t working u til i noticed the internal dust cup filling up \r it’s lightweight i have owned 2 other cordless vacuums and this one is the lightest by far \r since it vacuums itself i have yet to have a clog something that i was having frequently with other brands \r all of its accessories are stored right in the unit making them easy to store and find when i need them again other vacuum parts have been difficult to manage \r comes with 2 batteries my house is small so i’ve never run out of battery while using it but having a spare on hand is very 148 150 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2022-09-06 Jay323 Fantastic features This vacuum is by far better than fantastic. The feature that this has are amazing. Let me start with the sucking power of this vacuum. When this is on normal it is strong and great for loose crumbs, pet hair , dirt, etc. click it up to turbo and it get down deep in the carpet for dirt a normal vacuum can’t get. Next let’s go to the battery life. 2 batteries are more than enough to clean an entire house (my house is 2800sq/ft) and I have battery to spare. Let’s move on to the accessories you get all the tools you need to clean furniture under heat registers to tight spaces behind fridges and under tables. The wet mop head is efficient in cleaning your hard floors to a great shine and clean the mop head is very easy. Now let’s go to the base, it hides all the tools neatly and it looks modern and no one would know what is in there. The base also sucks out the dirt from the unit into a bag in the base for a hands free cleaning of the dirt out of the unit. Finally the wi fi option is great. Get the app and it tell you how much the vacuum is used, when the batteries are fully charged, the last day you vacuumed, how long you vacuumed, etc. This is a very durable product and is well worth the purchase. I don’t know how I made it with out one of these. NO POWER CORDS is great as well. All wireless. 5 0.296006 0.318992 fantastic, feature, vacuum, far, better, fantastic, feature, amazing, let, start, sucking, power, vacuum, normal, strong, great, loose, crumb, pet, hair, dirt, etc, 151 153 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2021-11-10 JennUNC123 Modern day cleaning system! The LG Cord Zero All-in-One Tower is not your standard stick vacuum, it's an entire cleaning system tucked away inside a modern piece of art! Even before I used the cordless stick vacuum to clean my home, I instantly felt that my house improved a few notches by having this fancy and extra sleek all-in-one tower displayed proudly in my laundry room. Not only does it it look beautiful, but it holds a myriad of tools and accessories that can be used to clean just about everything in your home. The suction of the vacuum is fantastic and the battery charge lasts for a very long time. An extra battery is included, but I haven't found it necessary since the charge hold is more than sufficient. The Vacuum itself is very light and it's easy to maneuver. \r\n\r\nAll of the six tools included in the tower have come in handy, but I especially love the mop nozzle option. It is super easy to use and only requires water while getting your tile and hardwoods spotless! \r\nAnother favorite feature of the LG CordZero is that the vacuum is cordless so you don't have to worry about getting tangled up in cords. Not having to constantly rearrange cords makes along with not having to find outlets to replug as you move through your home makes cleaning a lot less daunting. Lastly, the vacuum automatically clears the dust and dirt into a collection bag within the tower so you can don't have to "clean up after you clean up"! I would definitely recommend the LG CordZero All-in-One tower to everyone, but especially for those who love to use all the latest and greatest technology and innovative products. 5 0.258250 0.372372 155 157 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2022-06-17 Jesse Baynard I love it, but it the mop is a huge disappointment UPDATE: After a couple of months of use, this is my favorite vacuum to reach for and use. It's so convenient and easy to use. I finally filled my first bag and it was super easy to change and packed full of dust and debris that are no longer in my home... and not once did I have to shake debris out over an open trash can like other stick vacs. I still think they should've skipped including the mop but I found a small use for it when I had some construction dust on the floors. But as a quality of life changing simple yet powerful vacuum that doesn't make me constantly clean the cleaner I would rate this as 5 stars and very much worth the money.--------- ORIGINAL REVIEW --------Overall, if you are wanting a great stick vacuum (as long it's running on medium or high power), without all the dirty work of emptying out the dirt cup and money is no object then this is a great vacuum and I'd give at least 4.5 stars (I really wish it balanced better and you will eventually have to deep clean parts). But if you were considering a steam vac and hoping that this would do all... amazing vacuuming, storage, self cleaning AND also mop/sanitize your floors... forget about it. This is at best a damp mop without any real cleaning power. If you want this because of the mop feature I'd have to give it a low 3, it's not worth it and you really should consider that steam vacuum. It'd be nice if they offered this model without the mop attachment at a lower price.PROS:+ It's light and easy to use for vacuuming, one power button tap is all it takes to get it running+ Of the 3 levels of suction, the middle one is good and the top gear is very impressive. It will pull dirt in from a distance, much more than any other cordless vacuum (and even many corded ones).+ The self emptying feature removes the biggest common hassle among most stick vacuums. It's easy to use too, just drop it on and it takes care of the rest.+ The storage caddy has a place for everything (other than spare bags and pads)+ The spare charged battery means you never get caught with a dead battery mid clean.+ The debris compression lever is brilliant... It lets you run longer and solves the old hair wrapped around the filter problem common with other stick vacuums.NEUTRAL:* The Wifi feature is neat, I can see its charging status, care instructions, run a diagnosis and see the cleaning history all from the app. But none of that is terrible necessary.* The base, while great, does require you to dedicate a fairly significant amount of floor space, beyond it's square foot you need room on the sides for the large attachments to hang from and for the doors to open to get to the smaller accessories and the vacuum bag. You also need some space in the back for it to vent.* All stick vacuums seam to be guilty of it, but why so they provide such a worthless low power mode? I'm sure it's so they can advertise a 2 hour run time or some such nonsense... But it barely picks up large debris and when you turn it off it just falls back down the tube. Maybe for dusting delicate items? I'd much prefer the two useful power levels, one that's good enough for a several of decent sized rooms and another that will suck up killer dust bunnies.CONS:- The mop attachment is a joke. I'm not sure what the point of it is. It spins a rag that's a little damp? If you need to really clean hard floors, get a steam mop. For half the price you can get a killer vacuum and mop combination that really cleans and sanitizes the floor. This one does not get hot, does not allow detergents to be used, does not suction at the dirty water/grime, and barely has any scrubbing power. Maybe mine is defective, but it does light up and spin around?- It doesn't self stand or balance very well. I know a lot of premium stick mops don't but do they have to make them so awkward and top heavy that they are awkward to lean against a wall or chair for a short while? You could drop it back on its base, but that will start the self cleaning cycle and lock it into place for a couple minutes.- The manual makes several mentions of non replaceable filters or parts that will eventually need customer service to fix. In the base station in particular. This feels like an ominous time bomb waiting to put your expensive vacuum out of commission. Is it months, year or decades? No clue, but hopefully later rather than sooner. 3 0.193987 0.473147 love, mop, huge, disappointment, update, couple, month, use, favorite, vacuum, reach, use, convenient, easy, use, finally, filled, first, bag, super, easy, change, packed, full, dust, debris, longer, home, shake, debris, open, trash, like, stick, vac, still, think, shouldve, skipped, including, mop, found, small, use, construction, dust, floor, quality, life, changing, simple, yet, powerful, vacuum, doesnt, make, constantly, clean, cleaner, would, rate, 5, star, much, worth, money, original, review, overall, wanting, great, stick, vacuum, long, running, medium, high, power, without, dirty, work, emptying, dirt, cup, money, object, great, vacuum, id, give, least, 45, star, really, wish, balanced, better, eventually, deep, clean, part, considering, steam, vac, hoping, would, amazing, vacuuming, storage, self, cleaning, also, mopsanitize, floor, forget, best, damp, mop, without, real, cleaning, power, 156 158 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2023-05-16 Jessica L. Best upright vacuum (better than Dyson) The media could not be loaded.\n \n\n\n\n I have a Dyson upright vacuum and a robot vacuum so I’d like to try this one and compare:Packaging: great packaging with every single part is well protected. It comes with three boxes which is nice to separate the parts (charging/self-emptying station, vacuum, and extra accessories).Design: the design is great. Nice color. I like the charging/self-emptying station so much. This is the only upright vacuum that has the self-emptying function. Totally hands-free from the dust and keeps the vacuum bin clean like new after each time use. It’s a pain that I need to dump the dust out with my Dyson, even though it’s not difficult. It’s very nice that the station can also be used to store all the extra accessories and make it look so nice and organized.Vacuuming: the suction power Turbo mode has a similar suction power as Dyson and much stronger than my robot. I have allergic asthma so I need a stronger one for my carpet bedroom and walk-in closet. My robot has self-emptying function too but is not strong enough. See the picture of how much dust it picked up right after I used my robot. I’m very happy with this one’s suction power. I also like that I just need to press the power button to start/stop the vacuum, rather than pressing the button all the time (very annoying) when I vacuum with the Dyson.Noise: even it’s on Turbo mode it’s still quiet than Dyson, which is great.Other: nice to have an extra battery as it’s advertised. It also comes with several dust bags.Overall I really like this self-emptying vacuum. Much better than Dyson. I’m going to buy the mop and see how it works for the hard floors and tiles. 5 0.220296 0.406553 best, upright, vacuum, better, dyson, medium, could, loaded, dyson, upright, vacuum, robot, vacuum, 160 162 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2023-02-11 JoeS Easy Vacuum and Mop Tool If nothing else, this is so easy to do a quick cleanup or whole house vacuuming. It's relatively quiet and the suction is adequate. If you have a lot of pet hair, you'll probably need to empty the chamber during cleaning. That's easy to do, it just pops open and dumps into your trash. This is *not* a good unit for picking up large debris on the floor. \n\nThis vacuum/mopping system has replaced several cleaning tools. Our big vacuum, my little "car vacuum" and our damp mop. I vacuum the house, we used a robot vac for a few years, it took too long to straighten up for its use to make it a labor-saving device. I can vacuum with this and it does as good a job as the robot and I spend hardly more effort. \n\nIt cleans rugs well, it's a bit of a clickity-clackity on tile, but it also vacuums it well. \n\nThe width and height of the head allow me to get under almost everything in our house. \n\nI was initially amazed at how much dust, hair, and dirt the robot vac got up off of our seemingly clean floors. This vacuum does the same thing, perhaps a little more. So I know it's doing a good job. \n\nOnly once thus far have I used it long enough to run out of battery power and have to swap batteries. So it's got a pretty long runtime. We have a 2400 sq/ft house. Tile, bamboo, and carpet. \n\nThis fits into a really small corner of our house. Those are standard vertical blinds in the picture. \n\nIt gets a 4/5 for less than stellar suction and large particle cleanup. 4 0.211581 0.408361 easy, vacuum, mop, tool, nothing, else, easy, quick, 162 164 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2023-06-22 John Phillip Menard Hands Down the Best Cordless Vacuum I have had this vacuum for over a year and it is absolutely fantastic. Prior to this purchase I had two Dyson V10’s. Why two you may ask….because the Dyson doesn’t have a removable battery and basically lasts minutes. I was so frustrated using my Dyson….keeping it on low power and rushing to get the house vacuumed before it ran out of power. Then I bought this LG. It came with two batteries but I have yet to ever switch before finishing the house.The genius part of the LG system is that it empties itself out…..actually it vacuums itself out so it pulls all the dust and dirt out of the vacuum and filters. As far as using it….it’s perfectly balanced and moves like it was on ice. I also don’t get the Dyson finger bump (which you would know if you used the V10).I’ve used the LG mop attachment which is pretty good for getting kitchen floors cleaned but isn’t perfect. It’s a light duty mop.Over all this system is slick. Replacement batteries are awesome, the self cleaning feature is awesome, and the charging station fits perfectly anywhere and looks slick.This is well worth the price and is a great tool. 5 0.365152 The thing I have never seen anyone mention is the corner cleaning. One of the first things I noticed was that when I went along side a wall, that dirt was picked up very well. I didn't have to go back in to the corners and brush things out it was just all gone!\r\n\r\nIt's a little heavier than I expected, but still very light and manageable even with my arthritis.\r\n\r\nHaving asthma, one of the hardest things about vacuuming for me was that I had to wait for my husband to get home to take it outside and empty the old ones before I could continue. I don't have to worry about that anymore with this new vacuum because it does it all itself How simple can it get!\r\n\r\nThe speed of the machine on it's normal setting is more than adequate for my needs. Works great on my ceramic tile floors, wood floors and carpeting. I'm good to go! Merry Christmas to me for sure!\r\n\r\nI can't thank you enough for creating this vacuum. 165 167 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-05-23 Josh76 The vacuum that does it all I gotta admit, I'm a sucker for a great vacuum. I have 3 cats, 2 rooms with carpet and lots of furniture so a great vacuum is a must for me. I need to be great at 3 things: picking up cat hair from carpet and furniture, it needs to be great on hardwood for various cleanups, it must be light and convenient to use, and of course, it needs to be cordless. This new LG checks all of those boxes plus it has a mop! \n\nDo not be scared off by the giant, heavy box that this comes in. The tower that holds everything is incredibly easy to set up and the instructions are very detailed. I had this up and running within 15 minutes. I love how the tower holds all of the attachments plus an extra battery so I will never run out of juice.\n\nThe vacuum is light, powerful and does everything I need. It picks up cat hair and litter with ease and does a great job on my carpeted floors. The battery life is fantastic and the turbo modes give me the extra power when I need.\n\nThe tower works to empty the vacuum automatically so there is nothing stopping me from cleaning. The mop feature is pretty cool too. I have very shiny floors and it is tough to get them looking good, but this did the job well for quick cleanups.\n\nI could not be happier with this system and look forward to many years of use. 5 Test average 85-87mins of run time on auto low rugs, 55ish on lvl 2/65% pwr and about 25mins on full mode using both batteries. Found auto suction is as good has lvl2 from dysons v11 animal edition. So far have had this since black friday 2022 batteries are holding up to weekly use/drain. Now for a few con's only 2 things i find bad is wifi connection(needed to monitor vacuum bags and recommend maintenance updates yes lg app tells you maintenance) and the bags themselves. You have to buy extra bags to make this vacuum useable you can still drop into trash can. Thats the reason for the 4/5 stars. Other than that technology on this vacuum is awesome. 169 171 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-05-22 KKCNIck Almost perfect Whole Home Vacuum Vacuum for the whole home. I have 2 regular vacuums. A stick vacuum and a small cordless D***Bust** vacuum. I was hoping this would replace them so I can have one system to clean all the areas of our busy home. The setup was pretty easy but there was not a master set of instructions, so it was just open this and find out where it goes kind of install. After 20 minutes it was complete. I did have extra parts but they were for replacement filters and maintenance as I found in the manual. I downloaded the LG ThinQ app and paired the unit to my phone. Took about 15 minutes and 2 tries but finally connected. \n\nUse: I like the main vacuum brush for cleaning the main area of the home. The whole unit is comfortable to hold and not too heavy. I like that it is just small enough to fit in all the areas in my home where we vacuum. Most of the floor is Tile and LVT. We also have pets so there tends to be a lot of hair to pick up. In the first use I filled the container up in 20 minutes. There was a beeping noise to alert me that it was full. I set it in the base unit, and it auto emptied. This was where everything started to click. I can just pick it up vacuum and set it in the base when it is full. That is all. Not having to plug in the wall and hold the cord was helpful in getting the chore done fast. Then I used the smaller brush attachment to clean the harder to reach areas of the floor. Each time emptying in the base unit. Finally, I attached the mop unit and mopped the floor. It seemed like it would polish the floor and take up any shoe marks, but I did not notice any benefit from the mopping function. The following days I used it to clean little area’s that I would see more pet hair building. Just being able to grab and go is nice. I feel like this is almost perfect. I wish there were more color options and that the main brush unit was a little wider. In all it keeps my 2900 sq ft home clean and both batteries are more than enough to clean it.\n\nPros:\nCordless\nCondenses multiple cleaning tools\nLight weight\nLong battery life\nAuto Empties waste\n\nCons:\nWish it was less dust prone on the top of the base unit\nWish there were more colors\nWish the Mop function was stronger\nWish the Container held more 4 0.220113 0.369974 almost, 175 177 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2022-08-21 Kim I like it I’ll start by saying, I’d never have bought myself this vacuum as it is pretty cost prohibitive. My mother bought it for me as a gift and I’ve been pleasantly surprised. It has better suction than I expected it would. And since it is lightweight, I grab it almost everyday instead of a broom for my tile floors and instead of my bulky vacuum for carpets.By far, the most valuable feature is the fact that u don’t have to open that canister to empty it out. I’ve had other stick vacuums in the past that, while emptying it, I usually felt that I was just spreading all the contents around again. When u dock this vacuum, all the contents r sucked into an internal bag. My FAVORITE feature.I have 2 greyhounds that seem to continuously shed fur. So the ability to grab this vacuum rather push the fur around with a broom is much better.I’ve never tried the mop feature as it seems sort of pointless to me…which is maybe why this thing is priced so high.Like I said, I would never pay $1000 for a vacuum… but I LOVE the self-emptying feature… and it’s suction power will surprise! 178 180 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2023-01-11 LG cordzero A9 Good vacuum and mop I needed to replace my old stick vac after not being satisfied with its pickup and performance. I went to Abt store and tested all the vacuums on display. The one that stood out was the LG A9. After buying one and using it for a week, it has very good suction (even on the lowest setting) plus 2 boost modes, pickup of fine dust, fur and large bits is great on carpets, the body is light and easy to carry around and it runs quieter than other vacuums due to the inverter motor. The filter is easy to access from the top of the main unit and comes with a spare. The wall mounted charge dock is convenient. The brush hasn't tangled with any hair yet. Overall this is a great choice in the stick vacuum world. 5 0.418806 0.238042 good, vacuum, mop, needed, replace, old, stick, vac, satisfied, pickup, performance, went, abt, store, tested, vacuum, display, one, stood, lg, a9, buying, one, using, week, good, suction, even, lowest, setting, plus, 2, boost, mode, pickup, fine, dust, fur, large, bit, great, carpet, body, light, easy, carry, around, run, quieter, vacuum, due, inverter, motor, filter, easy, access, top, main, unit, come, spare, wall, mounted, charge, dock, convenient, brush, hasnt, tangled, hair, yet, overall, great, choice, stick, vacuum, world good vacuum and mop i needed to replace my old stick vac after not being satisfied with its pickup and performance i went to abt store and tested all the vacuums on display the one that stood out was the lg a9 after buying one and using it for a week it has very good suction even on the lowest setting plus 2 boost modes pickup of fine dust fur and large bits is great on carpets the body is light and easy to carry around and it runs quieter than other vacuums due to the inverter motor the filter is easy to access from the top of the main unit and comes with a spare the wall mounted charge dock is convenient the brush hasnt tangled with any hair yet overall this is a great choice in the stick vacuum world

189 191 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-09-08 LouRevue A bit pricey but great vacuum for your home This is more of a vacuum station than just a regular old vacuum. It's a bit pricey but it's still a great vacuum for your home. \n\nThis is your typical stick vac with a auto-emptying hub. It's quite nice in that you can empty the vacuum manually however, the base station had a feature where you can auto-empty it whenever you dock the vacuum. The base station itself looks good and looks refined. It's not just some gaudy tower that you shove in a corner and have it looking like an eye sore. With the different color options, you could color coordinate it with your decor if you wanted to so that it's stands out less. the footprint of the base station is pretty small so you can store it anywhere really without it getting in the way. \n\nIncluded with the vacuum are your usual attachments like a crevice tool as well as a floor scrubber which is nice. It doesn't vacuum up the liquid so it's really just a scrubber. There is a separate head attachment for the scrubber as well as some extra velcro pads to use on the scrubbing head. The attachments store inside the base station except the scrubbing head which attaches to the side. This also comes with an extra bag and filter for the vacuum. \n\nAnother nice feature is the extra battery. You store/charge the battery in the top of the unit so if you need to vacuum the whole place, you won't have to worry about running out of power midway through. This works ok for cleaning out your automobile too since it's portable however it's a tab bulky to get into some corners. \n\nLast feature is the compressor. With practically all these bagless vacuums, the center filter eventually gets clogged with debris so you need to disassemble the unit and clean that out properly to ensure proper suction. There is a lever on the bin that moves up and down on the compressor which allows you to scrape off a good chunk of debris on the interior filter without needing to disassemble it which I found to be quite beneficial. You'll still need to disassemble the unit for proper maintenance however, with this cleaner, you can do it far less. \n\nOnly real knock to the is the price tag. It is expensive for a vacuum and you could easily find a stick vac or even a larger corded vacuum for much cheaper. That said, this is more of a lifestyle item where you can have a great functioning vacuum and have it look good in your home. 4 0.219951 0.381003 bit, pricey, great, vacuum, home, vacuum, station, regular, old, vacuum, bit, pricey, still, great, vacuum, home, typical, stick, vac, autoemptying, hub, quite, nice, empty, vacuum, manually, however, base, station, feature, autoempty, whenever, dock, vacuum, base, station, look, good, look, refined, gaudy, tower, shove, corner, looking, like, eye, sore, different, color, option, could, color, coordinate, decor, wanted, stand, le, footprint, base, 190 192 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2023-05-23 Lunchbox09 Outstanding stick vacuum! We have more than a few vacuums in our home, multiple stick vac’s from the other brands, as well as canisters, and shop-vacs. This one takes the cake as my new favorite. First impression is that it LOOKS great, I hardly want to move it to a closet or the laundry room because it is so sleek looking. The tower holds all accessories, which is awesome because if they don’t have a place they usually get lost in my house, only to be found 3 years later. Also, the auto empty feature of the tower is just awesome. The other stick vacs that I have used were always a pain to empty, and I would wind up getting dirt and dust all over the garbage can, or the floor that I just cleaned. Now everything is contained. Right from the vacuum to a large bag in the tower! This LG vacuum is also a breeze to use, it feels balanced in my hand. The telescoping tube is a great feature, and allows me to clean without bending over (I’m 6 foot tall). As for power, there is no shortage. Just on the normal mode it does a great job, but when you turn on turbo there is a noticeable difference in power. This difference in power makes it slightly louder, but still not as loud as other vacuums we own. The kompressor feature is also a great addition. As you’re vacuuming you can push all the dust and pet hair collected down, leaving more room before emptying. Which is externally helpful if you live in a house that doubles as a zoo like us (2 dogs, a cat, a snake, a lizard, and of course three kids under 13). The tower also holds an additional battery, which stays charged for longer cleaning. All you have to do is open the top, and swap out the awaiting battery, and off you go! Great idea! The app is a nice feature to have, it logs the cleaning time and amount used. It also can notify you on when filters need to be cleaned and changed. The app also tells you the battery life remaining, and when the unit has finished charging. All in all I love this new vacuum, and would recommend it to anyone with a larger home looking for a stick vac! 5 0.254395 0.360494 outstanding, stick, vacuum, vacuum, home, multiple, stick, vac, brand, well, canister, shopvacs, one, take, cake, new, favorite, first, impression, look, great, hardly, want, move, closet, laundry, room, sleek, looking, tower, hold, accessory, awesome, place, LG went all out to design something sleek and functional, and the thoughtful, actual storage space for all the bits and parts that generally come with these devices is over the top.Moves fluidly, cleans very nicely with excellent suction and for as long as you need thanks to the extra battery pack, is unobtrusive when stowed away, and then cleans itself.Big recommend. 194 196 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2023-07-25 MICHAEL MUSANTE 1 year anniversary bomb We decided to splurge on an expensive cordless vacuum to help keep the fur from our dogs in check. This vacuum started out really good, I even liked using the vacuum. We kept the machine clean and really thought it was just what we needed for our two story house. Right before the one year warranty was up a part broke on it. Even though it was just a small part easily reparable the only way to fix it was to send the vacuum back to the service dept. No big deal I wasn’t paying for it and we still had the back up corded vacuum to get by, Now two months later the whole tower is not working and now I have to pay for it. 200.00 and I have to send the whole unit back. This is not an easy thing to do. On top of that the customer service is very disorganized, I do need to call customer service and be asked if “the unit is plugged in?” As reason it is not working. I was on and off the phone for 45 mins and transferred 4 times. I have 3 LG tv’s and a washer and dryer, pretty disappointed by the vacuum, time to move on. 2 0.109633 0.591951 1, year, anniversary, bomb, decided, splurge, expensive, cordless, vacuum, help, keep, fur, dog, check, vacuum, started, really, good, even, liked, using, vacuum, kept, machine, clean, really, thought, needed, two, story, house, right, one, year, warranty, part, broke, even, though, small, part, easily, reparable, way, fix, send, vacuum, back, service, dept, big, deal, paying, still, back, corded, vacuum, get, two, month, later, whole, tower, working, pay, 20000, send, whole, unit, back, easy, thing, top, customer, service, disorganized, need, call, customer, service, asked, unit, plugged, reason, working, phone, 45, min, transferred, 4, time, 3, lg, tv, washer, dryer, pretty, disappointed, vacuum, time, move 1 year anniversary bomb we decided to splurge on an expensive cordless vacuum to help keep the fur from our dogs in check this vacuum started out really good i even liked using the vacuum we kept the machine clean and really thought it was just what we needed for our two story house right before the one year warranty was up a part broke on it even though it was just a small part easily reparable the only way to fix it was to send the vacuum back to the service dept no big deal i wasn’t paying for it and we still had the back up corded vacuum to get by now two months later the whole tower is not working and now i have to pay for it 20000 and i have to send the whole unit back this is not an easy thing to do on top of that the customer service is very disorganized i do need to call customer service and be asked if “the unit is plugged in” as reason it is not working i was on and off the phone for 45 mins and transferred 4 times i have 3 lg tv’s and a washer and dryer pretty disappointed by the vacuum time to move on

198 200 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-05-18 Maclemoor Awesome vacuum tower The LG cordless zero A9 k is a beast of a machine. There are so many functions of this vacuum also mop that it’s hard to take it all in. The mop pads are super easy to connect disconnect take off and clean. Adding water to the tank is easy as well. It’s not a big water tank so using all of the water and cleaning out the tank makes for a cleaner reuse. Make sure you dry the water tank. The Wi-Fi is easy to connect if you have the app. I don’t use it because I don’t need it. But it is a good option. I put together the entire tower in less than 10 minutes. I like that it comes with two batteries. Straight out of the box I was able to vacuum part of my house. Charging takes overnight but it also depends on what mode you use. Regular mode isn’t enough to pick up all of the dog hair. Power mode is a good option and last between 20 and 30 minutes.\nTurbo mode only last seven minutes but it does pick up larger items. The fact that you have a second battery is also very helpful. The nozzles are able to be used on furniture and I can take it outside and use it in my car. The sound is fairly loud when you hook up the vacuum to the tower for the automatic empty. Not a big issue. I really like the compressor system because I’m able to vacuum a lot more without emptying more often. Overall this is a great vacuum I am unsure about the filter bags since we have a puppy we will go through a lot of them. 5 0.257194 0.301308 awesome, vacuum, tower, lg, cordless, zero, a9, k, beast, machine, many, function, vacuum, also, mop, hard, take, mop, pad, super, easy, connect, disconnect, take, clean, adding, water, tank, easy, well, big, water, tank, using, water, cleaning, tank, make, 199 201 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2022-11-01 Mactastic AUTOMATIC EMPTYING INTO A BAG! I received this vacuum about a week ago, and I’ve been using it for every day cleaning of my entire house. It has powerful suction, and it’s much quieter than cordless vacuums I’ve purchased previously. My favorite feature is the self-empty base, which automatically empties the contents of the dust bin into a sealed bag. No longer do I have to touch the contents of the dust bin, which will always be a plus. I simply remove, and throw away the bag, then insert a new bag into the self-empty base. Let’s not forget that the vacuum comes with not one, but two batteries that I can swap when one runs out of juice. The self-empty base will charge the additional battery while I’m vacuuming. With this vacuum I can track my cleaning history over Wi-Fi with the LG ThinQ app. Unfortunately, it isn’t without flaws, and requires improvement. Prepare to cut and/or remove long hair from the brushroll. It’s best to have a nozzle that prevents long hair from wrapping around the brushroll. Also there’s no illumination on the nozzle so I can’t see what I’m vacuuming. 4 0.175103 0.441007 automatic, emptying, bag, received, vacuum, week, ago, using, every, day, cleaning, entire, house, powerful, suction, much, quieter, cordless, vacuum, purchased, previously, favorite, feature, selfempty, base, automatically, empty, content, dust, bin, sealed, bag, longer, touch, content, dust, bin, always, plus, simply, remove, throw, away, bag, insert, new, bag, selfempty, base, let, forget, vacuum, come, one, two, battery, swap, one, run, juice, selfempty, base, charge, additional, battery, vacuuming, vacuum, track, cleaning, history, wifi, lg, thinq, app, unfortunately, without, flaw, requires, improvement, prepare, cut, andor, remove, long, hair, brushroll, best, nozzle, prevents, long, hair, wrapping, around, brushroll, also, illumination, nozzle, see, vacuuming automatic emptying into a bag i received this vacuum about a week ago and i’ve been using it for every day cleaning of my entire house it has powerful suction and it’s much quieter than cordless vacuums i’ve purchased previously my favorite feature is the selfempty base which automatically empties the contents of the dust bin into a sealed bag no longer do i have to touch the contents of the dust bin which will always be a plus i simply remove and throw away the bag then insert a new bag into the selfempty base let’s not forget that the vacuum comes with not one but two batteries that i can swap when one runs out of juice the selfempty base will charge the additional battery while i’m vacuuming with this vacuum i can track my cleaning history over wifi with the lg thinq app unfortunately it isn’t without flaws and requires improvement prepare to cut andor remove long hair from the brushroll it’s best to have a nozzle that prevents long hair from wrapping around the brushroll also there’s no illumination on the nozzle so i can’t see what i’m vacuuming
200 202 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-05-27 Magneto Could be better on carpets This is a very expensive product and I cannot give it more than two stars. The base had a crack in it when the product arrived and it is something that I did not expect from a 1000 dollar product. Extra headache consumes time and I hope this was just a one--off incident.\n\nIt took me around 20 minutes to get the parts out of the boxes, read the directions (two separate booklets: one for the vacuum and one for the charging station. It took me around 30 seconds to put everything together. Unfortunately, the base of the charging station came broken in the box. The charging station has a smart bento box-like design where the parts can be inserted when not in use. There are three different insets for dry vacuum (regular), mopping, and narrower head to reach into corners. The last one is great for staircases, between car seats, and floor corners. The set up looks nifty and cute The battery charger works fast, battery life is good, self-cleaning mechanism of the dust works fine.\n\nWhile the good looking, moderately heavy, good picker-up-er works well for lighter cleaning on hardwood floor, it could not handle my pet’s fur on carpet. The machine got stuck every few minutes and I had to open the top nozzle and clean out the rod with disposable chop sticks. My kids love crafting and carpeted floor in their room is always full of bits of paper. The bits of paper and the dog fur worked together and chocked the pipe after every two minutes. I will probably use this on hardwood floors, the car, and stairs only.\n\nThe function of the wi-fi is unclear to me and I am not sure if I will ever need to use the wifi. The placement of the turbo and wi-fi switches are a problem. It should probably be above the on/off switch instead of below. Or may be on the sides. While vacuuming, my hand kept hitting the turbo and that was a little annoying. Because of its top-heavy design, the vacuum cannot be kept anywhere in upright position except for the charging station. If you lean it on the wall, it will slide down because of the heaviness of the motor. \n\nThis small expensive fancy thing is good for light clean ups but unsuitable for carpeted floors in with furries and messy kids, which is a big disappointment at this price-point. 2 0.191608 0.441435 could, better, carpet, expensive, product, cannot, give, two, star, base, crack, product, arrived, 206 208 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-06-12 MarkusMN The All In One of Vacuums I have tried several vacuums and they have all their pros and cons. This is a very well designed and thought out system. It ranges from a compact vacuum cleaner to powerful upright with telescoping tubes for easy storage. \n\nThe charging station serves multiple purposes as it holds the main unit, charges the vacuum, stores a charged spare battery, empires the dust compartment and has ample storage for the attachments. The machine snaps right in place and plays a tone to assure you that it’s in place. \n\nThe vacuum itself does a nice job on all surfaces. It has a power button to up the suction, but the normal setting works well for most jobs. The cleaning head is smaller than normal, but this is a big plus for cleaning around corners, under furniture and other tight spots. \n\nOne feature that really separates from the others is the spinning polishing head. It has a water compartment with two spinning cloth pads to polish and clean linoleum, tile and wood floors. With two settings for water flow, it never saturated the floor and did a great job of putting just the right amount of moisture to do the job. The pads are easily removable and can be cleaned and reused. \n\nFinally, the battery life seems to be very good. I have been testing it for almost a week and I have yet to see the battery meter move. \n\nIf you’re looking for an all in one solution, this is it. 5 0.255597 0.277164 one, vacuum, tried, several, vacuum, pro, con, well, designed, thought, system, range, compact, vacuum, cleaner, powerful, upright, telescoping, tube, easy, storage, charging, station, serf, multiple, purpose, hold, main, unit, charge, vacuum, store, charged, spare, battery, empire, dust, compartment, ample, storage, attachment, machine, snap, right, place, play, tone, assure, place, vacuum, nice, job, surface, power, button, suction, normal, setting, work, well, job, cleaning, head, smaller, normal, big, plus, cleaning, around, corner, furniture, tight, spot, one, feature, really, separate, others, spinning, for easy storage the charging station serves multiple purposes as it holds the main unit charges the vacuum stores a charged spare battery empires the dust compartment and has ample storage for the attachments the machine snaps right in place and plays a tone to assure you that it’s in place the vacuum itself does a nice job on all surfaces it has a power button to up the suction but the normal setting works well for most jobs the cleaning head is smaller than normal \n \n but this is a big plus for cleaning around corners under furniture and other tight spots one feature that really separates from the others is the spinning polishing head it has a water compartment with two spinning cloth pads to polish and clean linoleum tile and wood floors with two settings for water flow it 207 209 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2022-08-31 Matt Sc Quiet, Great Vacuum, Eh Mop, Proprietary Bags Wow, I was not expecting so many parts and pieces to arrive in such a large box. After getting over my initial shock, everything was pretty straightforward to put together and all of the components and attachments either store in or hang on the base, so it doesn't take up as much room as I feared.\r\n\r\nThe vacuum itself is deceptively quiet and works great. We have a similar style stick vacuum from another well known brand and it must be 2-3 times louder than this vacuum, but seems to perform the same. We have a dog that'll dash out the doggy door when our old vacuum turns on. With this vacuum, she's still not pleased, but she'll hang out one room over instead of making a beeline for the backyard.\r\n\r\nThe vacuum itself comes with a number of attachments-- a general floor head (with spinning brushes) a narrower pet hair head (with spinning rubber flaps) and a mop (no suction, just rotating pads). It also has the usual brush, crevice tool, etc. One cool thing worth mentioning is that the aluminum tube (between the vacuum and head) is extendable, so this is actually comfortable to use while standing-- you don't have to hunch over.\r\n\r\nFor performance, I find that you can get about 15 minutes out of one battery on the highest speed, but closer to 45 minutes with the lowest speed-- which has more than enough power for hardwood floors, etc. This set also comes with a spare battery (that sits under the lid of the storage tower and is always charged), so you can actually get some cleaning done in between charges.\r\n\r\nThe general flooring head with the bristles works well-- it picks up pretty much everything. The rubber flap head for pet hair is okay. It does good for hair that is fresh on the surface (so couches, car seats, etc)-- but it does not work miracles. If you have a rug with hair that's worked in over the past 2 years and is really embedded in there, not much will get it out, including this head.\r\n\r\nThe mop head is a bit of a disappointment. It has a small reservoir, you can't use hot water, and you can only use plain water (no cleaning solutions). Because of this, it's really limited in its usefulness for me.\r\n\r\nFinally, the base/storage station is pretty slick. It always keeps the vacuum charged (expected), does a good job at holding all the accessories (good design), but the real feature is the auto emptying of the hand vac. If it's in AUTO mode, as soon as you dock the vacuum, it pops it open, sucks out all the dust and gets it ready to go again. I turned it off of AUTO because it is loud. It's basically as loud as a corded vacuum cleaner when it goes off. Overall, I love it. My only disappointment is that it empties the vacuum into a proprietary LG vacuum bag that they are currently pretty proud of. Hopefully a third party comes out with a more economical choice in the future.\r\n\r\nSo, final verdict? I love it, it's sleek, works well, is quiet, and is well thought out. Don't buy it for the mop feature (more of a gimmick in my eyes) and do be aware of the ongoing costs of the proprietary bags (though you can manually empty the vac into your own trash can, but that kind of negates the best feature of this system-- the auto emptying), but if you can get past those, then I think you'll really like what LG did with this product. 4 0.198999 0.452655 quiet, great, vacuum, eh, mop, proprietary, bag, wow, expecting, many, part, piece, arrive, large, box, getting, initial, shock, everything, pretty, straightforward, put, together, component, attachment, either, store, hang, base, doesnt, take, much, room, feared, vacuum, deceptively, quiet, work, great, similar, style, stick, vacuum, another, well, known, brand, must, 23, time, louder, vacuum, seems, perform, dog, thatll, dash, doggy, door, old, vacuum, turn, vacuum, shes, still, pleased, shell, hang, one, room, instead, making, beeline, backyard, vacuum, come, number, attachment, general, floor, empty, vac, trash, kind, negates, best, feature, system, auto, emptying, get, past, think, youll, really, like, lg, product \n \nquiet great vacuum eh mop proprietary bags wow i was not expecting so I usually lose the attachment pieces but this holds almost all of the attachments including the extra battery.\r\nI also love the auto empty feature and the mop feature. When he was done, I took the LG CordZero and went back over the carpet. Wow! I got quite a bit in the canister. My husband was impressed. I also love that the stand has self-cleaning. The dust that you typically have to deal with is non-existent when emptying out. I am so thrilled with this vacuum. I have not yet had the opportunity to use the mop feature on our hardwoods. Also it's sleek appearance has me not even minding that it sits out in the living room! It does have to be plugged in so it can charge - which makes storing it in a closet difficult. But it's so nice looking that it doesn't even matter. \r\n\r\nI recommend this over and over - I am geeky excited to have this new vacuum in my arsenal! 5 0.355772 0.337523 best, vacuum, ive, ever, 212 214 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2023-05-29 Mels44 Stylish Hassle-Free Cleaning The tower is definitely an interesting conversation piece. It currently sits in my dining room, where it has plenty of space to stand out. I must say, the tower is quite sturdy and complements any decor beautifully. It not only serves as a storage area for the spare battery but also provides a special spot for all the additional attachments. Once you're done vacuuming, simply press the button on the tower, and it will effortlessly empty the debris from the vacuum, conveniently storing the vacuum itself.\r\n\r\nNow, let's talk about the vacuum itself. It's a typical stick vacuum, but what's impressive is how quiet it is. It's by far the quietest vacuum I've ever used, and its lightweight design makes it ideal for quick and easy clean-ups. It's especially efficient at picking up dust, small crumbs, and pet hair. The lightweight feature also makes it a breeze to clean furniture and tackle stairs in the house. In terms of suction power, it performs admirably in regular mode. If you need some extra oomph, there's a turbo mode available that provides a significant boost in suction power, although it does come with increased noise and power consumption. The turbo mode drains a fully charged battery in about 10 minutes, so it's better suited for shorter cleaning sessions. Thankfully, the battery lasts much longer when using the regular mode. As a mother of young kids, I must admit that I was slightly disappointed with its ability to handle larger crumbs with ease. Additionally, I found it a bit challenging to push on my rugs compared to hard surface floors.\r\n\r\nAll in all, it's a great lightweight stick vacuum that works wonders for quick cleaning on hard surface floors and furniture. The tower is a practical addition, ensuring that the vacuum is always conveniently ready for use. Plus, having an extra battery is a real lifesaver, providing ample power to meet all your vacuuming needs. Personally, I particularly appreciate the tower's self-emptying function, the option to switch batteries, and the storage space for all the additional accessories. 5 0.282501 0.331447 stylish, I'll be ordering a new one. My only negatives are that the vacuum heads seem cheaply made for the money. The plastic seems like it will break easily. The turbo mode takes you immediately in a low battery. 222 224 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-05-20 Mothabo Need more power Dope concept, it just doesn’t have the suction I expected for $1000 bucks 2 0.299715 0.417685 need, power, dope, concept, suction, expected, 1000, buck need more power dope concept it just doesn’t have the suction i expected for 1000 bucks
223 225 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2022-08-30 MrB Expensive, but a superb vacuum system Very expensive, but after using it for a week, I am convinced it is well worth the cost. Dual batteries are really helpful, suction is excellent, tools are good, and the auto empty feature is brilliant - it really is the icing on the cake. My Dyson has been recycled - inferior in all respects. 5 0.840611 0.075208 expensive, superb, vacuum, system, expensive, using, week, convinced, well, worth, cost, dual, battery, really, helpful, suction, excellent, tool, good, auto, empty, feature, brilliant, really, icing, cake, dyson, recycled, inferior, respect expensive but a superb vacuum system very expensive but after using it for a week i am convinced it is well worth the cost dual batteries are really helpful suction is excellent tools are good and the auto empty feature is brilliant it really is the icing on the cake my dyson has been recycled inferior in all respects
224 226 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-05-26 Mukman Nice Multi Use Vacuum Set up and instructions were easy to follow.\n\nLG even supplies 2 quick access cards with all the assembly and maintenance items needed. Well formatted and written.\n\nYou also can download an app called LG ThinQ to your phone. This is a smart home app for all things LG. It allows you to see the usage of the vacuum, charge status, run diagnostic and shop at LG store. (As of the writing of this review, I could not find the filter bags at the LG store)\n\nAs quick overview, below are my pros and cons.\n\nPros:\n•\tGood Suction levels\n•\tRolls Nice – Head stays down\n•\tGood battery life when in default mode\n•\tNO CORD\n•\tSelf-Cleaning\n•\tLight weight\n•\tExtra battery with onboard charging\n•\tHidden tool storage\n•\tEasy extend/disconnect buttons\n•\tOn/off Power button\n\nCons:\n•\tOnly 9” wide brush\n•\tFilter bag cost\n•\tMop head unit disappointing\n•\tWould like larger collection bag or canister (People with pets)\n•\tWill push around larger items like cereal/pretzels on hardwood floors\n\nOverall, I really like this, LG CordZero. It does the job well for what is designed for. The Self-cleaning tower is probably the most impressive feature.\n\n \nAs mentioned above (in Cons) the only small tweaks I would prefer is to make the head a little larger to cover more area at a time. The small size does have the advantage of getting between items like chairs though.\n\n\n I would also like to see either larger holding bag in the self-cleaning unit, or a canister you could just dump out. \nWe have two dogs that shed, so the cleaning bag located in the self-cleaning stand will fill up quickly. \nI have used this about 10 times and the bag is almost full.\nThis will result in an added expense, so I do wish this bag was larger, or less cost for replacements. I found the bags online at $19.99 for a pack of three. (Thee came with the unit). If you have no animals, this will not be a problem for you.\n\n\nExperience with cleaning: \n\nThe stick itself is easy to extend with the push of a button. Much easier than other units I have tested.\nYou can easily add the accessory pieces to reach into ceiling corners etc. I did use the brush accessory to clean our ceiling fan grills and found that I had to use the turbo mode to prevent the dust from just falling on my head. All other vacuuming, I have used the default mode and it seemed to clean well.\n\n\nWhat my wife noticed early on is that this unit will clean the light bathroom rugs without sucking them into the head unit like others do. Best vacuum so far at this task.\n\n\nMy experience with cleaning hardwood floors is that if you have normal dirt, it cleaned fine. If you had a larger piece of dried food, such as broken pretzel or a piece of cereal, the head unit would just push it around. If you need to pick those items up, I found if I simply picked up the head and pulled backwards over the debris, it picked up fine. I did use the Power mode for more suction.\n\n\nCarpet cleaning worked well in normal mode.\n\n\nThe power and function switches are located on the top. No need to hold the button down to clean like some other units. You can hit the plus button for more suction and minus for less. If you hold the plus button down for three seconds you get into turbo mode. This has incredible suction but will drain your battery quickly.\n\nBattery Max run time as indicated on the supplied card:\nUsing nozzle:\nTurbo Mode – 6 Minutes\nPower Mode – 20 Minutes\nNormal Mode – 40 Minutes\n\nUsing a tool:\nTurbo Mode – 7 Minutes\nPower Mode – 30 Minutes\nNormal Mode – 60 Minutes\n\n\nThe self-cleaning tower unit has a clean look, stores all your tools, and does a great job emptying the canister. It stands 40” tall and need to plug into the wall outlet. It stores all accessories and holds and charges the spare battery and the vacuum.\n\nEvery time you store the vacuum, you need to retract the stick and place into the base. Automatically the unit will empty the canister. This is a little loud but only last about 30 seconds. You can press the start/stop button on the top of the tower to bypass this if you like.\n\n\nThe Kompressor slider is nice feature. It allows you to compact the dirt in the canister using a simple slider lever, allowing more use between having to empty. Also allows you to discharge dirt when manually emptying the canister. Other units I have tested lack this feature and forces you to use a tool or your fingers to get all the dirt out. Nice job LG.\n\nSpeaking of tools, LG does include a small brush to clean out the canister when doing maintenance.\n\nFilters appear easy to maintain and do an awesome job filtering out the dust and allergen particles.\n\n\n\nMop Head feature:\n\nWe did not find this super useful. It does an okay job laying water down on the floor to maybe remove something items the vacuum could not, but if has no option to spot treat with a little extra water like some mop units. The head has three water dispensing settings, Off, Low & High.\nYou are instructed to only fill the reservoir with water. We may try spraying some floor cleaner down first to see if we get better results. \nYou must go slow when cleaning as well. After we cleaned the kitchen floor, we then ran a swiffer over the area and found it picked up quite a bit of dirt. So not sure this mop head will be used much for us.\n\nSo, final thoughts. I would say for a house mostly with carpet or hard floors with standard debris, this is a nice unit. The self-empty feature is fantastic.\n\nIf you have mostly hardwood, with kids that drop cereal or such larger (Pea size of large) items on the floor that you would like to pick up with the vacuum, there might be better choices such as vacuums with front soft roller, or other method to pick up larger items.\nIf you have mostly carpet and want a universal vacuum that can do your daily tasks, has a tower that can not only store and charge the vacuum but can also self-empty and hold all the accessories PLUS another battery. Then you might consider this LG CordZero All in One Auto Empty.\nIf the auto empty is not a feature you need, LG does offer other options for less cost.\n\nWarranty – 1 year parts and labor, but 10 year on the Inverter motor.\n\n~Reviewers in this invitation-only program are provided products for the purpose of writing honest, unbiased reviews 4 0.224395 0.319691 nice, multi, use, vacuum, set, instruction, easy, follow, lg, even, supply, 2, quick, access, card, assembly, maintenance, item, needed, well, formatted, written, also, download, app, called, lg, thinq, phone, smart, home, app, 225 227 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2023-06-21 Munkykween Wow! Just Wow! This is an incredible vacuum, especially for a cordless stick vacuum! I am totally in love with it! Not only does it have storage right there on the sides for all the attachments, but the entire unit is sleek and, dare I say, sexy. As for performance, it's outstanding. I thought I would only use this on the hard floors and the basement with the Berber carpeting, but it did a great job on my plush carpeting upstairs, too! It's quieter than my last vacuum, has good suction, transitions from carpet to hardfloor seamlessly, maneuvers like a dream, and has NO CORD! Talk about convenient and easy to use! Of course, the most amazing part is how it cleans itself! After I'm all done vacuuming everything high and low, I just set it back into it's base and it sucks all of the cat hair and dirt right out of the vacuum and into a bag inside the base! How awesome is that?!? No dust, no mess, no fuss, to pulling out parts to shake over the garbage can! Also, all of the filters are hand washable. It comes with an extra filter, dust bags, all sorts of attachments, and easy to follow instructions and information!I LOVE LG! LG must stand for Life's Great, because every time I purchase a new product from them I am blown away with how well thought out it is, how great it works, and how much easier it has made my life (I love their clothes washers and dryers - they make me so happy, not to mention their smart tv).You need this vacuum! 228 232 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2023-05-22 Nessa82582 Amazing I love the LG cordless vacuum cleaner! Assembly was super easy, each part came with easy to follow instructions. It took my son and I about 10 mins to assemble completely. I love how light weight the vacuum cleaner is! I struggle with back problems and I had no problem adjusting the handle to fit my height. I also love how the vacuum base swivels and fits under small spaces. I was able to vacuum under my kitchen table and chairs without moving it. Also, the vacuum did an amazing job reaching all the way under my bed (I have a bed that sits high off the floor). Overall, this is the best vacuum I’ve owned! The only downfall is price, I feel like it’s slightly over priced. For the price of the vacuum I feel as if it should vacuum on its own…not me still pushing it. It’s a plus that it does self empty but I still have to push it…lol. 5 0.485294 0.252087 amazing, love, lg, cordless, vacuum, cleaner, assembly, super, easy, part, came, easy, follow, instruction, took, son, 10, min, assemble, completely, love, light, weight, vacuum, cleaner, struggle, back, problem, problem, adjusting, handle, fit, height, also, love, vacuum, base, swivel, fit, small, space, able, vacuum, kitchen, table, chair, without, moving, also, vacuum, amazing, job, reaching, way, bed, bed, sits, high, floor, overall, best, vacuum, owned, downfall, price, feel, like, slightly, priced, price, vacuum, feel, vacuum, still, pushing, plus, self, empty, still, push, lol \n \namazing i love the lg cordless vacuum cleaner assembly was super easy each part came with easy to follow instructions it took my son and i about 10 mins to assemble completely i love how light weight the vacuum cleaner is i struggle with back problems and i had no problem adjusting the handle to fit my height i also love how the vacuum base swivels and fits under small spaces i was able to vacuum under my kitchen table and chairs without moving it also the vacuum did an amazing job reaching all the way under my bed i have a bed that sits high off the floor overall this is the best vacuum i’ve owned the only downfall is price i feel like it’s slightly over priced for the price of the vacuum i feel as if it should vacuum on its own…not me still pushing it it’s a plus that it does self empty but i still have to push it…lol

231 235 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2023-06-24 Nichole Good vacuum I've had stick vacuums in the past and wasn't a huge fan because it seems they get clogged easily. This one is no different. It clogs often, but Im thankful for the little lever you can push down to help. The attachments are nice and it works well in tight spots. I like the tower for storage however I don't like that the tower takes bags. I thought we were far away from bags. The suction is mediocre but works well on the high setting. I also like that it has multiple batteries. For the price? 234 238 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2023-03-14 Nirajan Not great as advertised. The product arrived in a torn case with missing parts. Contacted the seller and their response was we are sorry but you need to return it in the same case for a refund. 236 240 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2022-09-01 Olivia Moon Extraordinary vacuum! The LG CordZero has immediately become my favorite vacuum! Set up was so simple for the tower, the vacuum itself, and the Wi-Fi/ThiQ app. First thing I did was get the batteries charging. Being able to charge the extra battery to have ready at all times is convenience at its finest! Next up was putting all the accessories in their place inside the tower. How wonderful to have a place for everything, right where you need it. I enjoy vacuuming so much more when it’s cordless. Cleaning can be a pain, having to drag a cord behind you, needing to switch plugs when you move onto a farther room! I am ecstatic to be cord free! I am able to go directly from the hardwood floors, to the tiled floors, and right to the carpet with ease. There’s no change in suction, no switch needing to be switched. It’s completely effortless. The battery life is superb. Two-story home, multiple bathrooms and bedrooms, a loft, kitchen, dining room, office, and a laundry room… all vacuumed with battery still remaining, 1/3rd to be exact. Let me tell you, you never knew you needed your vacuum to empty itself until you have this LG CordZero Vacuum!! I never would have thought that would be my favorite feature. It’s incredible! The pictures I have attached are from the first use, after vacuuming with my current vacuum the day before! This not only shows that the suction power of the Smart Inverter Motor can get what your current vacuum is leaving behind, but also how well the auto empty feature works! Just when you think this vacuum can’t get any better… Power Mop attachment! Amazing! This one vacuum has been able to replace three cleaning tools (stick vacuum, dust buster, and mop) for me and I am so thankful! 5 0.278960 0.332466 extraordinary, vacuum, lg, cordzero, immediately, 238 242 THE HOME DEPOT LG A939KBGS 2023-06-05 Oscar CA So far beyond my expectations! Wow! LG really hit it out the park with this vacuum! It does is all! Vacuums, mops, empties debris on it own! Set up was relatively easy, maybe 15-20 minutes, and it is only because everything comes so well packed. The mop features 2 dual spinning microfiber pads, which do all the hard work for you. My other mop is officially retired! I have never seen my kitchen floors so clean! The vacuum has a 5 step HEPA filtration system, so you know you are getting a clean carpet with less allergens left behind. It comes with 2 batteries, it is recommended to switch them out after every use to extend the life of the batteries. Which makes sense and is very fast and simple to do. They say it goes about 2hr before needing a charge or needing to switch batteries. But honestly, it only takes 20- 30 minutes to completely clean my floors. The housing tower is great! It's stylish but low-key so it does not stand out. It houses just about everything, it is great having everything in one spot! It empties the broom stick in seconds and is relatively a quite process. Over all it went way beyond my expectations! It has changed the way I cleaned and has made the actual cleaning process easier, taking a lot less time. 5 0.300841 0.361735 far, beyond, expectation, wow, lg, really, hit, park, vacuum, vacuum, mop, 248 253 BEST BUY LG A939KBGS 2022-05-17 RalphHenry Powerful Vacuum That Empties Itself I was very impressed with the functionality of this vacuum system. There are two parts, the cordless stick vacuum and the power base. The vacuum proved to be very powerful in cleaning about 1200 square feet of carpet on the turbo setting and still had plenty of charge left. This system came with two batteries. It is important to state one battery charges in the base power unit (to be ready when needed) and the other battery will also charge when the stick vacuum is docked on the base unit. Very smart design point. These 26 volt batteries provide a lot more suction power than the usual 14 to 18 volt systems; and proved long lasting as well.\nAfter vacuuming 1200 square feet I noticed that the dust bin on the stick vacuum had about 3 inches of hair and dust particles. I had just used another cordless stick vacuum the day before for the same area. So this test definitely showed the LG vacuum power was far superior. \nThe power base unit has its own vacuum setup to suck out the stick vac’s dustbin into a dust bag housed in the power base unit. I can confirm that the 3 inches of pet hair and dust was removed into the base unit (see my before and after photos). When I looked at the stick vac’s dust bin, not only was all the debris gone but it appeared the inside of the dust bin had been wiped clean – great system and a tip of the cap to the LG engineering team. You will notice that when the base unit cleans the stick vacuum dust bin, it actually opens the bottom plate on the dustbin and closes it again when the cycle is completed – I love that kind of engineering. The whole system has solid quality and is very well designed.\nThe system included a very complete set of accessories that included a small cleaning brush which was very handy for cleaning filters, a crevice tool, a combo brush and suction head that was great for cleaning car floors, a vacuum head with moving roller-brush for carpet, a mop head (2 spinning disc-shaped mops with liquid chamber) and a pet nozzle for furniture and other areas. Wow, a lot of uses covered. All these accessories store in the power base unit.\nIf all these features aren’t enough, the unit connects to your home’s WiFi system. Now using your cell-phone you can monitor activity of this vacuum system. I initially thought the WiFi control button was on the base unit, but it is on the stick vacuum and is labelled. The unit easily connected to the WiFi – you must use a 2.4 GHz access point.\nI did also run the included mop head to clean my kitchen and bathroom floors. Easy job but be sure to wash the mop heads by hand after each use. It’s easier to dry the mop heads in a dryer but don’t put the heads in a washing machine.\nThe technology used in this vacuum system is outstanding. I highly recommend this vacuum system. 5 0.222840 0.352000 powerful, vacuum, empty, impressed, functionality, vacuum, system, two, part, cordless, stick, vacuum, power, base, vacuum, proved, powerful, cleaning, 1200, square, foot, carpet, turbo, setting, still, plenty, charge, left, system, came, two, battery, important, state, one, battery, charge, base, power, unit, ready, needed, battery, also, charge, stick, vacuum, docked, base, unit, smart, design, point, 26, volt, battery, provide, lot, suction, power, usual, 14, 18, volt, system, proved, long, lasting, well, vacuuming, 1200, square, foot, noticed, dust, bin, stick, vacuum, 3, inch, hair, dust, particle, used, another, cordless, stick, vacuum, day, area, test, definitely, showed, lg, vacuum, power, far, superior, power, base, 255 260 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2022-08-22 Roni This one certainly sucks.... in a good way This vacuum is amazing with a lot of great features. When you first open the box, the vacuum and attachments are in three boxes. The initial set-up of the vacuum is fairly easy once you open everything. The base for the vacuum is very simple and modern. The vacuum sits nicely in the middle with auto charging, the sides are actually doors where you can store the attachments, the bag is on the inside of the base, and the extra battery charges on top. I love that I can store everything and not have to see it all. The package comes with the vacuum itself, the base, two batteries, a general vacuum attachment, pet hair attachment, mopping attachment, two smaller attachments, a spare battery, 4 microfiber mop clothes, two reusable filters, and two bags.In my apartment, I have rugs and laminate floors. I had no issues with using the general vacuum attachment to clean everything. The suction is great, but you are able to increase the suction to turbo. The turbo works great for hair or extra dirt, but it does drain the battery quite a bit more. I recently had a friend with a dog visit and was excited to test out the pet hair attachment. It’s significantly smaller so if you have a large space, it may take longer to clean. I think it did a great job getting all of the hair out of my rugs. If you have a pet that is a heavy shedder, this may not be for you but mild-moderate shedding would be fine. They have a soft attachment that I used for corners, baseboards, window sills and it was perfect for cleaning up some dust.I was very excited about the mopping attachment. I think it’s a wonderful feature with some limitations. Directions say to only use water, so you can’t use any floor cleaner. You are suppose to wet the pads before starting, which is definitely necessary! The mop attachment has a water reservoir and three levels to dispense water: no water, low water, or high water. It certainly dispenses a lot less than I expected. I’ve kept it on high water and by the time I clean my kitchen floors, I couldn’t even tell the water tank was empty. I think this is a great feature for just regular maintenance of floors, but if you need to really clean them, may need to use a regular mop. The microfiber clothes are soft on the floor and the vacuum does a great job rotating them while cleaning. Safe to use on my laminate floor.LG has produced a package of additional attachments to use with this vacuum, including a mattress attachment. I use the pet hair attachment on my mattress recently and worked fine! But it’s nice to know there are extra attachments to purchase.The biggest highlight of the system is the automatic dispensing. There’s nothing I hate more than emptying a vacuum and getting dust and hair everywhere. Once you bring the vacuum back to the base, it automatically charges and automatically cleans out the debris in the vacuum and dumps it into the bag. The system alerts you when the bag is ready to be changed. It does such a wonderful job at getting everything out of the vacuum! It is a bit loud when it does this, but it doesn’t take long.Overall, I highly recommend this vacuum! It’s sleek, lightweight, easy to use, and keeps everything clean. There’s always limitations to cordless vacuums, but overall this vacuum does an excellent job. I’m very satisfied and looking forward to cleaning with it! 5 0.252087 0.348917 one, certainly, suck, good, way, vacuum, amazing, lot, great, feature, first, open, box, vacuum, attachment, three, box, initial, setup, vacuum, fairly, easy, open, everything, base, vacuum, simple, modern, vacuum, sits, nicely, middle, auto, charging, side, actually, door, store, attachment, bag, inside, base, extra, battery, charge, top, love, store, everything, see, package, come, vacuum, base, two, battery, general, vacuum, attachment, pet, hair, attachment, mopping, attachment, two, smaller, attachment, spare, I was able to do multiple rooms in a single charge. Also, this vac is very quiet compared to my others. 268 273 AMAZON LG A939KBGS 2022-11-13 Soso LG Vacuum warranty service is terrible. Let me TLDR this real quick. The vacuum is great, when it works... My base unit broke and this is the story of my warranty service....I bought this unit a month ago and not soon after I got it the base unit stopped working. I called LG support and was transferred to India or the Philippines or whatever where a representative(who barely spoke english) made me run through a bunch of "troubleshooting" procedures ending with, "Now you have to unplug the unit, wait an hour and call us back" As ridiculous as this was I did it, and sure enough called back the next day where once again I had to do all of the same troubleshooting again until I finally got fed up and told them either set up an exchange or I am going to return it to the retailer(Amazon). The guy actually told me that's exactly what I should do(as in return it to the retailer). Never heard of this in my life.... Anyways, since the vacuum was actually still working (just the base was broken) I asked why can't I get the base fixed? So after another 30 minutes I was offered what is the only option for service on these. You have to pack the ENTIRE thing back up(the box is HUGE), ship it back to them, wait up to two weeks for them to fix it and then they will send it back. They said the whole process can take up to a month.... This is ridiculous, every large company these days will either send you a replacement right away and put a hold on your credit card so you send the old one back or they will at least let you ship it back and when they get it, send you a new one out again, but these guys want hold on to your broken one for a couple weeks while they try to fix it.... Ridiculous. The vacuum is good when it works but I won't buy another until they change their warranty policy and stop farming out their customer service to people who don't understand you and vice versa. 2
